profile.NA:
Valentine's chocolate from Vritra.


With just one bite, its sweetness would numb even your brain, euphoria rushes about your whole body, you would be drooling non-stop as you want to eat it more and more, a chocolate so delicious that it is devilish...... Or so it apparently is, however, it is hidden inside this mechanical box (crafted box).


Unless humans exhaust the limit of their wisdom and might, they would never be able to open it, however, if they work hard, and seriously and earnestly devote all their body and soul, they can open it, maybe...... As this box is something created by her, the Dragon of Confined Boundary, ability, it is set at the miraculous most difficult balance, and outside forces would not be able to destroy it.


On top of being unable to be scanned by normal magecraft and science, if you forcefully try to obtain the solution in one move using analyzing Noble Phatasms, the chocolate inside will melt and fuse with the mechanism.


"Ki, hi, hi. I won't make it easy for you. Show me more of your unsightly struggling, climbing form.

A long-established mage lineage.

The talent and “Jewel”-rank Mystic Eye contained within my body.

The expectation of my parents and the chronic disease in my family lineage.

My whole world is covered in an ashen colour.


There must be something else aside from the gloomy things, such as the feelings sprouting out from my body that was drenched to the bones and losing heat, right?


Besides hanging my head like a flower sagging under the weight of the raindrops, there must be something that I could do, right?


I thought that it’s meaningless to reach out my hand to the untouchable sky───

Yes, that’s what I had thought.


But, there was a hero who put up a beautiful rainbow in the sky.

There was a hero who removed the calamity from the sky.


───There was a person who aimed for a world beyond the sky all by himself.


Telling me that if I go beyond the thick rain cloud, a bright world is waiting.

People who would say that kind of thing with a smile, they were here.

profile.NA:
Her beautiful appearance is striking, the questionable yet divine beauty steals the breath of those who look at them away.


However, even if you were to turn your overflowing feelings into red threads, you would not be able to bind that thing’s hearts to you.


Because even if her hair is more lustrous than satin, her eyes more dazzling than quartz, her lips cuter than cherry blossoms, she is definitely―――


Not a mute doll.

profile.CN:
缓和温暖的海风。
乘着海风来访的鸟儿们的鸣啭。
被赐予了丰饶恩惠的大地，枝叶摇曳的翠绿树木。
在起起落落的海浪推送下，海岸边的白色浪花美丽地起舞。

总是透过工作室的窗口看着这些。
而这一切，都在温柔雕刻声的包裹之下。

突然，心生疑问。

这段记忆中的自己，是人吗。
还是雕像呢？

不管哪种都无妨。
因为无论如何，自己的所有幸福都在那里。
总是被温暖、令人安心、令人满足的某种存在所包围。

那就是他的爱。
同时——也一定是守护我们的美丽女神的目光。

现在仍未失去这种感觉。
正因为如此，只要闭上眼睛就能回忆起。

塞浦路斯的记忆无比美丽。
即便此时此刻，也在活在自己的身体中。
profile.NA:
The gentle and warm sea breeze.

The chirping of the birds riding along those winds to visit.

The land was given abundant blessing, and the green trees' branches and leaves swayed.

Carried by the waves that come and go, the white foam of the beach danced beautifully.


I was always looking at them from the workshop’s window.

Wrapping all around those things was (nothing but) the gentle sound of the chisel.


Suddenly, I started to wonder.


In that memory, was I human? 

Or was I a sculpture?


It didn’t matter which.

Because whichever I was, everything that made me happy was there.

I was always surrounded by something that was warm, relieving, and satisfying.


That thing was his love.

And ―――The beautiful Goddess’ gaze that no doubt was watching over us.


That feeling, even now, still isn’t gone.

That’s why, just by closing my eyes, I could remember it.


My memory of Cyprus is, forever beautiful, and even at this very moment, living within me.

Let’s draw my inspiration on this beautiful blank paper.

Take a pen in my hand―――


......Ah.

I’ve thought of a really good idea.

But, what should I do?

I’m so nervous.


What if, it gets rejected?

What if, it doesn’t turn out good?

What if......

Non!

I have had enough with being afraid of the future.

It’s because you are the person who has given me hope!


I exit the atelier and saw you from behind.

I call out to you gracefully and give you my greetings.

And then, I will say this and invite you to join me.


“Shall we create a wonderful dress together?”

profile.CN:
音之粒子　旋转律动
浮上心头　淡淡念想
拨动琴弦提出疑问
闪烁的星辰　在我的银河中
来回穿梭
寂寞的远地点与近地点
但愿明日能继续加速
送到你的面前——
profile.NA:
The elementary particle of sound, fall down, bounce

Fleeting thought, emerges

I want to ask a question while fingerpicking

Twinkling stars, in my galaxy

Going back and forth

The apogee and perigee of loneliness

Tomorrow it will accelerate even more

I hope that it will reach you―――

profile.CN:
帷幕落下，跳出故事之外，
在通往庆祝宴会的道路上优雅地前行。

正因为是那样的一刻，
被牵着手，携手共进，
作为礼数是不得已的事情。

微微露出笑容，也是没办法的事情。
profile.NA:
The curtain drops, we leap out of the story and leisurely make our way to the banquet.


Only in such moments that it’s inevitable to have my hand taken and joined according to etiquette.


It’s also inevitable that a smile, albeit small, begins to form.

profile.CN:
交杯祝酒，谈笑风生。

诉说着漫长的旅行，
弹奏着曾经的回忆，
为了将交错过、断绝过、紧紧纠缠在一起的牵绊理开。

一边润着喉咙，一边悠闲地消磨时间吧。
profile.NA:
We raise a toast, and have a chat.


We talk of journey long past, play music about the memories of old, change, share, and the tightly tangled edge seems to unravel.


Just leisurely taking our time, while quenching our thirst.

profile.CN:
尽大义者卸下了他们肩上的重担。
为那场宴席而送上的花束，
必须要格外豪华才行。
否则，就不能锦上添“华”了。

因为这个故事的主演和配角，所有的人，
无一不是绽放出无限光辉的一等星——
profile.NA:
Those who achieve great cause have that responsibility dropped on their shoulder.

The flowers given at the banquet must be something remarkably magnificent.

If not, the “flowers” won’t be able garnish them.


The reason being, in this story, everyone, from the leading roles to the supporting characters, are first-magnitude stars that emit infinite radiance―――

profile.CN:
没有过多交谈。
也并没有那个必要。

因为在交错的视线中，
已然包含了无数慰劳辛苦的话语。
profile.NA:
There is not much to say.

Nor is it necessary to do so.


Because things like the words showing her appreciation for his hard work are put into the looks they exchange, ten thousand fold.

profile.CN:
随着从者的增加，
迦勒底陷入了严重的资源不足状态。
为摆脱这种窘境而下达的最残酷指定乃是……

一起庆祝吧！
庆祝奇迹的嘉年华！
profile.NA:
As more and more Servants join Chaldea, maintaining resources for so many is becoming a problem. And so, a cruel order has been given...


Let's celebrate the miracle Carnival together!

profile.CN:
自己前行的方向始终都是漆黑一片。

身为魔术师的才华普普通通，出身也十分平凡，
好不容易找到的可以充分运用高御主适性的机会，
却在棺椁中消失于虚空。

剩下的只有，
本可以做到什么却未能实现的后悔。

即便如此，那个世界的夜晚依然有光。
不像阳光那么强烈，也不像月光那么柔和，
犹如夜晚降下的雪那样，散发着幽幽的光芒。

所以，必须活下去。
毅然起立，不能屈服，无论倒下多少次，都要站起身。
即便怀着无数的后悔，也要面向前方。

因为在那已然不存在了的世界中，
对于如雪花般消失的她来说，
我卡多克·泽姆露普斯，
是她唯一的御主。
profile.NA:
The path I walk has always been in the dark of night.


My talent as a mage is average, my family lineage is also unremarkable, and the opportunity to put my aptitude to be a Master, which was finally discovered, to good use disappeared into the void of the coffin.


The only thing I have is simply the regret that I should have been able to become something.


Even so. There was light within the darkness of my world.

It is not as strong as the sun light, nor as gentle as the moon light, just a faint light, like the snow falling at night.


That’s why I must live.

Pull yourself together. Do not fall down on your knees. Rise, no matter how many times you must.

No matter how numerous regrets you hold, move forward.


Because to the girl who has disappeared like a snow flower in that world that no longer existed, this Kadoc Zemlupus is the only Master.

fandomLink: Beyond the Night Without the Snow Flower

profile.CN:
这是不会存在于正确道路上的
空想可能性。

将刀刃插在烟灰飞舞大地之上的，
是无法屈服也无法挫败的
化作心之剑（铁）的正义身姿。
profile.NA:
It’s a possibility of a fantasy that does not exist on the righteous path.


The one who stabbed the blade into the soot filled land is a figure of justice, one with a heart of sword[iron] that can neither be bent nor broken.

profile.CN:
利用代代相传的特性，
耗费漫长的时间编织而成的宝贵结晶。

其中若有与少女年岁相仿之物，
甚至能用来释放大魔术。

从那凝缩了神秘的宝石中释放而出的光辉，
酷似她内心之强大，
高尚，且美丽。
profile.NA:
They are the crystallization of the jewels that have been woven through a long period of time using special characteristics inherited over many generations.


Particularly, it is possible to perform great magecraft with the ones that are as old as this girl.


The radiance emitted from these jewels formed by mysteries is as noble and beautiful as the strength of the girl’s heart.

profile.CN:
无论想逃到多远，
也无法与之分离。

无论怎样模仿人的举止，
回头望去，都会发现其孤身
从空荡荡的水缸中悄然而来。
profile.NA:
No matter how far I run away, I could never separate from it.


No matter how much I act like a person, looking back, submerged within the empty fish tank, it has been creeping up on me.

profile.CN:
诞生的理由——是为了消失。

比喻来说，
就像落在树梢上的积雪终将被阳光融化，
回归土地一般。

那是早已注定的。
本就是作为这种存在被制造出来的。

但即便如此，她仍然祈愿。
愿所爱之人获得胜利。
并坚信，这才是作为人类活过的证明。
profile.NA:
The reason she was born―――is to disappear.


If a comparison must be made, it would be like the snow piling on top of the treetop eventually melted by the sunlight and returns to the earth.


It is something that has been decided beforehand.

That’s the reason she has been created, to be that kind of being.


Yet, the girl still wishes.

Wishes for the victory of her beloved.

She believed that is the very proof that she had lived as a human.

unknownCharacters: 爱丽丝菲尔·冯·爱因兹贝伦

profile.CN:
无论是头脑、容姿，还是家境，
这类令人艳羡的东西他都拥有。

但唯独缺少一件。
唯独缺少魔术的才能。

他比任何人都清楚。
无论多么渴望，
如何勤奋钻研，
也有绝对得不到的东西。
profile.NA:
Whether it's intellect, appearance, or pedigree, he had everything that make people envious.


But there is just one thing that he didn't have.

That is the talent for magecraft.


He knew that no matter how much he crave for it, no matter how efforts he put into studying, that there is something that he can never get.

profile.CN:
这是湖中妖精赐予的，
无比尊贵、闪耀的存在。

这是只有诞生于星之内海，
漂流到地表的妖精才会获得的，
创造世界的大母之证。
只要服从乐园的使命，
就迟早能化作星之魂的精灵抵达之处。

——但是。
她说这并非自己的愿望，
因此抛弃了被允诺的荣耀。

治愈同伴的杖变成了打倒敌人的枪。
与生俱来的眼中之光在战斗中失去了。
在漫长旅途的最后，失去了很多东西。

取而代之换来的，则是白垩之宝座。
是她不断祈愿的不列颠的故事。

……但是，现在仍会想起。
在止境之国受人喜爱的日子。
是被丢弃在温柔石之宝座上的，逝去之梦的代价。
profile.NA:
It’s the most precious and glorious thing that has been given to her by the faerie of the lake.


The symbol of the Great Mother who built this world, only given to faeries who were born in the bay of the stars, and washed ashore to Earth.

As long as they comply with the duty of paradise, they would eventually be able to become the spirits of the stars, that is the ultimate goals of the faeries.


―――However.

She abandoned the promised glory, saying that it was not her own desire.


The wand that heals her allies changed into the spear that brings down her enemies.

The light in her eyes that she was born with was lost in battles.

At the end of her long journey, she has lost a great many things.


What she got was a throne of white wall instead.

The legend of Britain that she kept wishing for.


......Yet, even now, she still remembers.

The beloved old days at the land at the furthest end.

The price of a bygone dream left behind in a gentle throne of stone.

profile.CN:
这是黑犬公不为人知的爱好。
从休息日的午后起，花费充足的时间，
烹饪拿手的菜肴与尝试新菜肴。

「毕竟有伴侣，做这些不是很正常嘛。
　……只不过，
　我不会强迫你做相同的事。
　因为这是我出于爱好心甘情愿做的。」

说着这些话的黑犬公脸上露出了心满意足的微笑。
仿佛只要重要的人能来厨房看一下情况……
就足够幸福的样子。

这就是所谓的爱妻料理。
不过对人类来说，尺寸或许有些太大了？
profile.NA:
This is the secret hobby of Sir Black Dog.

On her days off, she spends all the afternoon cooking her specialty menu as well as cooking up new dishes.


“It’s a matter of course, as you can see, I have gained a partner.

......That said, I won’t force you to do the same thing.

This is just what I like to do, that’s all.”


Sir Black Dog has a satisfied smile on face as she says that.

As if to say that she would feel happy as long as an important person has come to see the state of her kitchen......


They are the so-called beloved wife dishes.

But hold up a minute, I think the portion might be too big for a human?

profile.CN:
「衣服、房子、料理什么的。
　这些我还是知道的。嗯，我知道。
　因为即便是妖精，也是会做这些事的。
　但连脚上穿的东西也要自己花工夫什么的，实在是做不到。
　真的做不到，快晕倒了。
　因为那是脚哦？　是脚后跟哦？
　是要彻底打扮最敏感的部位哦？
　大胆、华丽、妖艳、优雅。
　听说泛人类史已经没有魔法了，
　这看法太有眼无珠了。那么多魔法鞋，
　连妖精国都见不到啊。
　可以看、可以穿、可以拿来当摆设，
　但我的梦想当然还是自己做一双。
　一点一点提升技术接近一流。
　你觉得要做出理想的鞋子需要花费多少年？
　1年？　还是10年？
　届时，只要我还活着，
　到那时，你愿意收下一双作为纪念吗？」
profile.NA:
“Things like clothes, houses, or food.

I understand that much. Yes, I do.

Even those kinds of things are popular with the faeries, after all.

But, I can’t even with figuring out these shoe things.

Seriously I give up. My consciousness is leaving me.

It’s feet we’re talking about here? Them heels, you know?

You can decorate your most sensitive place to your heart’s content, you know? 

Bold, gorgeous, captivating, and elegant.

I have heard that there is no more magic in the Pan-Human History, but the peepholes finally became useful here.

I have never even seen this many magic shoes in the faerie realm.

They are nice to look at, wear, or decorate, but my dream is really to have my own pair of shoes.

Little by little, little by little, raise my skills and get closer to the first-class.

How many years do you think it would take to make my ideal shoes?

1 year? Or maybe 10 years?

If I’m still alive by then, at that time, please get me a pair of shoes in celebration?”

profile.CN:
无论存在方式多么丑陋，
无论生存方式多么危险，
也不会改变那天见到的价值。

比46亿年的记忆更为炫目的反复无常的奇迹。
在下／我见证的地表最为美丽的存在。

即便躯体崩溃，心灵粉碎，
这份憧憬也不会消失。

美丽的极光（欧若拉）。
闪耀星辰的容颜。
永恒不变的爱，在此。
profile.NA:
No matter how hideous of a being I am, no matter how evil my way of living is, the worthiness that I saw that day does not change.


A whimsical miracle that was more radiant than the memories of 4,6 billion years.

It was the most beautiful thing that I have seen on earth.


Even if my body was to shatter, even if my heart was to break into pieces, I will never stop yearning for it.

For the beautiful aurora.

For the visage of the shining stars.

For a forever unchanging love, at this place.

profile.CN:
这把圣枪，
原本应该被存放在合适的场所。
即便自己是身负光荣的圆桌骑士一席之身，
这也不是一介骑士该拥有的东西。

但是人理……
选中这把圣枪——
选中朗基努斯作为我的宝具。
或许迫近的危机已经巨大到如此程度了吧。

既然如此，那我就该回应。
携起圣枪，屹立于战场的最前线。
——御主，与您一起。
profile.NA:
By nature, this Holy Lance is something that should be kept in an appropriate place.

It is not something to be owned by a single knight, even if that person holds a seat in the glorious Round Table.


However, the Human Order has......made the Holy Lance my Noble Phantasm.

The Longinus, to someone like me.

To go as far as this, the approaching crisis must be significant.


Then, I shall respond to that.

I shall take up the Holy Lance, and stand on the front line of battles.

―――Together with you, Master.

profile.CN:
（不知不觉）出现在新·迦勒底的伟大图书馆。
无论建立经过如何，其作为知识的宝库都是无可挑剔的，古今东西各种邂逅都在这里等待着。

每当翻过一页，跨越时光的情感都会令你心满意足吧。
profile.NA:
A great library (somehow) comes to be in Novum Chaldea.

Regardless of how it was established, it is perfect as a treasure trove of wisdom, waiting for all kinds of encounters at all times and places.


As you turn the pages one by one, you would surely be filled with emotions that transcended time.

profile.CN:
尽情游玩之后，
请品尝海边主厨推荐料理吧。

今日的特制三明治是……
那边的小动物，你不要我刚做完就开吃啦！
profile.NA:
Please enjoy these recommendations from the chef at the beach after you have had your fun.


Today’s special sandwich is......

Hey you little beast, stop trying to eat everything that I’ve just made!

unknownCharacters: 希翁·艾尔特纳姆·索卡里斯

profile.CN:
「创办NFF服务的原因？
　……这么说来，我还没告诉过你吧。
　这虽然是兼顾了兴趣与利益的创业，
　但并不是为了……
　折磨各位人类而设立的。
　我高扬斯卡娅有个梦想。」

这是对她唯一尊敬的某个人类献上的敬意。
人类首个发明了写真杂志、
在巨大的市场首次开创了服饰商标权的人物。
创办了具有个性意义的杂志，成为了媒体的宠儿，
备受社会的批判，却为人种歧视而奋战之人。

「高傲、能干、完美主义。
　无论在工作上还是在私生活上都精力充沛的风云人物。
　在被称作娱乐的事业上获得全面成功的他，
　唯一没能实现的大事业——
　那就是建设度假区。
　我就是为这种未竟之事感到遗憾，
　才创立了NFF服务。」

身穿发牌员服装的妖艳美女如是说。
凭自己的权能，创造都市轻而易举。
但是，这样是没有意义的。
供人类享乐的都市，
就该在人类的系统中建立才行。
成功与破产都是硬币的两面。
为了细细品尝这种悲喜，
建立了全行星最大的赌场度假区。
看上去完全是个蝴蝶结的高楼大厦，
就是建立于度假区中心的灵魂地标。

「只不过，还请您不要误会。
　各位人类的欲望，
　也只配用来装饰我的头发罢了。
　一旦我用腻了，就会轻易摘下扔进海里。
　请千万不要误以为——
　自己被我所爱哦？」
profile.NA:
“......Speaking of which, I haven’t told you about why I started the NFF Services, have I?

It is an entrepreneurship that serves as both a source of income and my hobby, however, it is not something that I founded because I want to......torment all of humanity, no, it’s not.

This Koyanskaya has but a single dream!”


She has respect for a certain human, the only one that she reveres.

The first of mankind who made gravure magazine and one who established trademark rights in a gigantic market.

The one who fought against racism while making liberal magazine, becoming the media’s darling, and facing many criticisms from society.


“A pompous and skilled perfectionist.

A seeker of fortune who was energetic in both work and sex.

There was only one business that guy, who was successful in anything remotely related to entertainment, couldn’t achieve―――

It was a Casino Resort establishment.

That’s why I started NFF, with regards to that unfinished business.”


The bewitching beautiful woman wearing dealer clothing talks about how it is easy to build a city with her own authority.

However, that would make it meaningless.

It needs to be a city built in the humans’ system, to give humans pleasure.

Success and bankruptcy are two sides of the same coin.

The largest Casino Resort in this planet was developed so you could taste that mixture of joy and sorrow.

The huge building that looks like a ribbon is a symbol of that spirit.


“On that note, I hope you don’t misunderstand.

After all, the likes of all humanity’s desire are only worth as much as some decorations for my hair.

Once I lose interest in it, I would pick it up and throw it to the sea without a second thought.

Please don’t make the mistake of thinking that you are being loved sincerely―――or something, ok?”

mcLink: 高扬斯卡娅的野心～东海岸版～

profile.CN:
如果没有看到『未来』。
如果不继承女王的职责。
如果乐园使命有所不同。

以及，如果。
她在梦中不断描绘的妖精国能够延续下去。


『光辉的堡垒』一定会迎来很多妖精的来访吧。
耀眼的阳光。
推心置腹一起欢笑的友人。
大街上擦身而过的众多幸福。
虽然没有华丽的服饰，
却不知何时戴上了星辰般的发饰。

——春日的记忆，犹如这般。
即便是无法实现的未来，
这样的日子，也一定存在过。
profile.NA:
If I didn’t see “the future”.

If I didn’t have to inherit the duty of the Queen.

If the mission for Paradise had been different.


And, if.

If the Country of Faerie that she has been depicting in her dreams had been continued.



Then, many faeries surely would have visited “The Shining Fortress”.

The sunlight so dazzlingly beautiful.

The amiable friends laughing to each other.

Many happy ones pass by on the street.

Even though I didn’t dress up, somehow, there was a star-like hair ornament there.


The memories of spring were like this―――

Even if it was a future that never comes true, surely, such days must have happened.

profile.CN:
这是某位妖精的故事。

「早就准备好了哦。
　咱这就为你量尺寸。」

在漫长的修行，与如此如此漫长的沉睡之后。
与自己等待已久的新娘重逢的妖精
为了不让眼泪溢出眼眶，拼命地装模作样。

「别再穿铁铠甲了。
　请容许咱为你准备无与伦比的礼裙。」

为了无比幸福的未来。
为了无比重要的回忆。
展现为那天而准备的
自己引以为傲的技术吧

就这样，对妖精来说，最棒、
最美妙的时间结束了。
新娘穿上完成礼裙的样子，
正如多次在梦中见到完成度。

犹如披星戴月，
新娘十分高兴地感谢了妖精。
只此一句话，
妖精的旅途顺利地走到了终点。



话说回来。

「——嗯，早上好，玛修。
　太好了。
　能听到你这么说，咱非常高兴哦。」

虽然她要之后才会在冰之棺中沉睡。
但希望在她醒来之际，
能赶在任何人之前，将这份心情传达给她。
profile.NA:
This is the tale of a certain faerie.


“The preparation has been finished a long time ago.

Let’s get to measuring right away.”


After a looong training, and an even looonger slumber.

The faerie met the bride she has been waiting for again, and she tried her best to stop her tears from spilling out.


“It’s time to stop wearing that iron armour.

Let me prepare the best dress for you.”


For the happiest future.

For the most important memory.

For this day, she will show off the skills she has been polishing.


Like that, the most wonderful time for the faerie is over.

The figure of the bride wearing her finished dress that she has been dreaming of so many times was finally happening.


The bride, looking as if covered by stars, was very happy and thanked the faerie for it.

With that single word, the faerie’s journey came to an end safely.



On that note.


“―――Hmm, good morning, Mashu.

I’m so glad.

Being told that makes me very happy.”


Unfortunately, after this, the girl came to sleep in the ice coffin.

The faerie wanted to be the first one to greet her when she woke up, and to tell her how she feels, earlier than anyone else.

profile.CN:
秋之森的公主坠入了爱河。
爱上了生来就犹如尸体的王子。

森林里的同伴都在为王子的出现而欢呼雀跃，
唯有她一个从远处静静凝视。

即便在王子站起身，窥见他的内心之后，
公主的心意依然没有改变。

被抛弃妖精们的聚集地。
即便嘲笑说这里是妖精国的底层，
王子也并未将住家搬离秋之森。

做了好事之后，会仔细地在森林的溪流中洗手。
做了坏事之后，会无视弄脏的翅膀倒在落叶上。

王子讨厌不列颠的一切。
也讨厌妖精们，和秋之森的同伴们。
但是，

「我又不是神明。
　可管不了这种放任不管也会自己消失的家伙哦。」

当知道了王子真正讨厌的东西之后，
公主，
心中暗暗决定要为王子振翅飞翔到最后一刻。

她相信，这才是唯一能温暖他冰凉四肢的火。

　　　◆

这是没有被讲述的断章。
是那大骗子一直隐瞒到最后的，一位骄傲公主的故事。
profile.NA:
The Princess of the Autumn Forest fell in love.

She fell in love with a Prince who looked like he was born a corpse.


While her forest friends were being merry about the arrival of the Prince, she alone was gazing at him from afar.


Even after the Prince recovered, and she caught a glimpse of his heart, the Princess’ heart remained unchanged.


It was a hangout for discarded faeries.

While he laughed at them for being the low-class in the Faerie Kingdom, the Prince did not move his home from the Autumn Forest at all.


After doing good things, he would be meticulously washing his hands in the forest’s river.

After doing bad things, he would collapse onto the fallen leaves with his wings still dirtied.


The Prince loathed all of Britain.

He also loathed the faeries and the forest friends.

However,


“I'm no god.

Even those who disappear if you leave them alone are too much for me to handle.”


Knowing what the Prince really hated, the Princess, until the very end, kept the fact that she flapped her wings for his sake to herself.


It's because she believes he was the only fire that could warm her cold limbs.


　　　◆


This is a literary fragment that couldn’t be told.

The story of a proud Princess, hidden by a big liar.

fandomLink: A Pavane for the Deceased Princess

profile.CN:
少女于黄昏之星祈愿。

愿这泪水，
不是为了悲伤或痛苦，
而是为了喜悦而流下。
愿能守护珍爱之人们的笑容与念想。

已经不会再放弃任何事物了。
将凝聚的愿望化身为剑。
用小小的手——宣誓获得胜利。
profile.NA:
The girl wishes upon the twilight stars.

She hopes that her tears would flow not for sorrow and pain, but joy.

She hopes that she could protect the smiles and wishes of the people who are very important to her.


She won’t give up on anything anymore.

She puts her desperate wish into the sword.

profile.CN:
因杰出的才能，受到了周围人的期待与执着。

自己就是这样一个无可救药的人渣。

profile.NA:
The people around me held expectations and obsession for my outstanding talents. 
But I can’t live up to those because of the way I am.


Although I felt no resentment, no hatred, no sorrow, 

I decided to sever my beloved hometown’s traditions and karma.


That’s who I am—a monster beyond salvation.


But then— 

I had a partner who shouldered my rage.

I had a junior who called me caring with a smile.

And I had somebody who understood who I am at my most beautiful.


They attest that I gained more than just dark memories from living my life true to myself.


I smile shyly atop the cliff of Samsara, accompanied by a beautiful twilight sky and a blow of refreshing breeze.

profile.CN:
——传闻中无名的英灵
曾使用过的雌雄剑。

尽管起初只是微弱的火苗，最终却成为了烈焰，获得了名为炼狱的强大力量。同时，也在漫长的战斗中觉醒了自我，拥有了近似人类情感的存在。

就是这样，虽然说着什么好像很厉害的东西，不过说白了我就是把会说话的剑，也不是什么特别稀有的剑啦。对了，实际的性能在合体时会更高哦，本人都这么说了，信我准没错。现在这样，只不过是我在独立行动形态时考虑到各自的战斗方式，才分成雌雄双剑而已。
分成双剑时，较短的雄剑司掌主人的力之侧面，较长的雌剑则司掌技之侧面。

原本是不被容许、或许根本不存在的、很不起眼的夏日一刻。

哎呀，毕竟吃了那么多苦头，所以应该也能容许这一点点奇迹的发生吧。


——你说是吧，我终生的主人。
profile.NA:
―――A pair of male and female swords said to have been formerly wielded by a nameless Heroic Spirit.


It was once a small flame, however, before long, it has become a blaze, gaining a mighty strength and was called “Purgatory (Rengoku)”. And then, amidst the long battles, it became self-aware, and attained something that resembles a human's will.


Welllll, it sounds like I’m saying something snobbish here, but I am actually, how do you guys call it, a talking sword. Not that that kind of sword is rare though. By the way, the actual performance is superior when both swords are combined, since it’s said by the sword itself, it cannot be wrong. The pair of male and female swords are separated simply because I take into consideration the individual fighting style we have when we act independently.

When separated, the shorter male sword is in charge of strength, while the longer female sword is in charge of techniques.


It was a very tiny, insignificant moment of summer that shouldn’t have existed and shouldn't have been allowed to exist in the first place.


What, considering that we have been through so many horrible things, at least this kind of miracle should be allowed, you know?



―――Don't you agree, my life-long Master?

profile.CN:

来吧，维！　从一边开始不停地吃吧！

啊，御主请不要动哦。

来，啊~♪

怎么样，好吃吗？　我当然是觉得非常好吃啦。

不管吃什么我都会觉得好吃的。

Ah, please don't move, Master.

这个就这样弄，这里就那样做……呼。

不擅长的事情也并没有变得擅长起来。
既然如此，我所能做的就只剩下练习了。

还请你千万，不要看穿我拙劣的演技，
不要注视我止不住颤抖的手。

再怎么没有才能，也只能凭着手上的一副牌战斗下去。

雷动的掌声、欢呼、笑容。
展现出华丽幻影迷人心神，如梦幻般的一刻。
我的全部。
profile.NA:
Put it this way, and put this here......Phew.

The things that you are not good at won’t suddenly become your forte.

In that case, all you have to do is to practice.


Please do not see through my shoddy performance.

Please do not stare at my hands that cannot stop trembling.


After all, human life is all about fighting with the cards you have, no matter how little talents you have.

Even though I am not good at this at all, these are my humble gifts to you.


The thundering applause, the cheers, and the smiles.

A dream moment, one that captivates you with its gorgeous illusion.

My everything.

profile.CN:
旅行结束，回来后，我整理着行李。
虽然没有什么比得上铭刻在心中的回忆，
但是每当看到给我做的布偶时，
就会想起那场十分平静的告别，以及夏日的特异点。

吵闹着、慌乱着、挥洒汗水放声大笑，
奔跑、摔倒，再奔跑，一圈圈地打转迷路。
一句“好开心”道不尽，
一句“累坏了”说不清。
无论喜怒哀乐，全都挤得满满当当。
这是没有其他任何人的，独属于我的故事。

和伙伴们一起见过明灭闪烁的星空。
和伙伴们一同看过澄澈无垠的晴空。
就算想不出具体的什么，
我们也确实共享过美丽的事物了。

然后，面对着似是整理完毕又好像没整理过的行李，
我轻声对自己说一句，
「好了」。
profile.NA:
I put away my luggage after returning from the trip.

While there is nothing that can compare with the memories engraved in my heart, each time I look at the stuff animals they made for me, I would remember our parting, which was filled with tenderness, and then, I would recall that Summer Singularity.


It was boisterous, it was wild, we sweated, we laughed loudly, we ran, we fell, and then we ran again, we went around and around, and we got lost.

"Fun" is not the word to describe it, and "super" is not enough to explain it either.

Joy, anger, sorrow, and enjoyment, they are all packed in there.

It was a story that exists only for me and no one else.


I watched the glittering and sparkling starry sky with my friends.

And I watched the clear blue sky with them too.

Even if I cannot recall the details, we have definitely shared something beautiful with each other.


Standing in front of my luggage that looks like it has been tidied up in a way that looks like it hasn't been tidied up at all, I muttered one word, “Alrighty”.

profile.CN:
在炎炎夏日的阳气之下。
口中冰凉甜美地融化开的冰激凌是堕落的味道。
在此之上再只选择喜好的口味叠上两层三层发出连续攻击，怎么可能有人能够抵挡呢？留到最后的松脆筒身也很美味哦。嚼嚼。

要是渴了，还有气泡直冒的碳酸饮料！
那可是滋滋作响哦——
你知道吗？很厉害对吧。为什么人类居然能发明出这么傻的饮料啊。
而且居然还说这样的饮料有夏天的味道……意思是在夏天热到爆炸所以就要喝气泡乱爆的饮料吗。
这也太好笑了吧。吸吸。

还有闪亮登场的超豪华芭菲！
新鲜的水果和甜~甜的奶油。
简直是吃也吃不腻的味觉万花筒！
这样的东西人类根本忍不住嘛。咬咬。

不止是食物，可爱的泳圈，快乐的水上游戏，还有很多很多。
无论如何，这个魔王准备的堕落套餐的效果绝对不容置疑。毕竟——

「嗯——果然夏天是最适合堕落的季节呢。夏天，
　最棒了！」

……魔王本人，似乎也无法从这份堕落中逃脱呢。
profile.NA:
"In the sweaty summer weather, the cold and sweet ice cream melting in your mouth tastes like corruption.
 
And after a nonstop combo of two or three rounds of your favorite flavors, there's no way you can resist, can you?
 
This last crispy corn will also taste delicious. Chew.


When you get thirsty, I'll be there to pop open some soda! Wow, look, it's fizzing.
 
You already knew it did that?
 
It's amazing, though. Why would humanity invent a drink this stupid? What part of this is summer-like...?
 
Is it because it's a bubbly drink and summer makes people bubbly?
 
Pretty lame pun, if that's the answer. Gulp.


A volumous tower of parfait! Fresh fruit and super sweet cream.
 
A true kaleidoscope of flavors, where you can eat all you want without ever getting tired of the taste! No human can resist this. Slurp."


It's important to note that it's not all food. She has her cute floating ring, fun sea bathing times, and a lot more.
 
This Demon King's corruption kit has no room for error. After all...


"Oh yes, summer really is the best season for corrupting people. I love the summer!"


the Demon King herself can't escape its corruption.

profile.NA:
"Shaved ice mixed with liana syrup and put in a new silver bowl.

1000 years ago, she called this an "Elegant Thing".
 
A new bowl with ice and syrup sweeter than any fruit, in an era when people rarely had the chance to eat ice, and sugar was still considered medicine.

Her heart will never lose this vividly carved sweet memory of sharing this treat with someone on a distant summer day.


Every summer comes to an end.

Men, women, the young, and the old, everyone is equal as they are given birth into a theatre (world) from the sea of imagination―――

Wet your hair with the twinkles of the stars, comb it with flowers fragrant, then let the night wind take this burning sensation away.

A mechanical warrior said to have been controlled by a Shrine Maiden of the Seal.


Long ago, there was a God of the land who was said to boast unparalleled strength.

He defeated beasts, destroyed evil, and always won his battles.

And so the God continued to fight to protect humans, however, in his final moment, he was betrayed by the very people that he protected.


Even so, as he took in the blades of the humans, he did not utter even one word of resentment, he simply took everything as he was.

And just like that, the God's body was mercilessly torn into pieces by the people he had continued to protect, his name taken away, and his life as a God came to an end.


Or so the story goes, whether it was true or not, this is the story of Zanzaburou.


Anyway, when I found Zanzaburou in the treasure house, he was already in tatters, and I had serious doubts if the doll really was the remains of the God in legend.

Still, seeing his tattered face, I just couldn't leave him alone, so I fixed his armour, his helmet, and many other things, and now we have the current Zanzaburou!


After that, we travelled together, danced together, and went on a wandering journey to vanquish evil together.


I know not my parents nor my hometown; the me who does not know myself, could probably be called a family of one......


Whoop, the time for depressing stories is over. It seems there is a problem tonight as well. The calamities that bring harm to humanity; I shall charm and destroy them with my dance!


―――Wake up, Zanzaburou!


That's right, this is the God who protected humans without even leaving his name behind. Even if he has become a corpse, he still continues to protect humans.

Once, she was called the Saintess of the Winter.


It's been long, so long, since she was produced and kept in the old castle in the snowy mountain, her mind, her transient soul, and even her memory circuit has all worn out, before long, she continued to live in "unchanging days", and finally, she became the foundation of a great achievement.


From the outsiders' point of view, she was a beautiful device.

From the obsesseds' point of view, she was the regret engraved into their old days.

From the girls' point of view, she was the supreme glory to themselves.


At the present, she is just a distant tale.

The Saintess falls asleep within a perfect world.

So that she could embrace and keep the many unfulfilled ideals within her arms.

unknownCharacters: 羽斯缇萨·里姿莱希·冯·爱因兹贝伦

profile.CN:
在那冬天永存的世界里，
无垢的孩子们，为被赋予的生命而鞠躬尽瘁。

这是为了实现大愿，
哪怕只是一个微不足道的齿轮。

教导也好，博爱也好，
一切都是世上独一无二的，
只为保护那白色的花。
profile.NA:
In a world where winter is a permanent fixture, the immaculate children devote themselves to the order they have been given.


Even if they are just a single small insignificant gear in the realization of a great ambition.


Whether it is teaching, or friendship, everything is simply for the sake of protecting a single white flower of this world.

profile.CN:
端正背脊，调整好教室的通风，
新鲜的空气与爽朗的谈笑。

正是这种理所当然的日常，才是最可贵的东西。
profile.NA:
Straighten my back, arrange the school's communication, being in a healthy mood and having cheerful friendly chats.


Those things are, naturally, more precious than anything else.

profile.CN:
远离日常的喧嚣，
来到大自然中去。

那里什么也没有，
正因如此，
这里才是一个能自由创造出「快乐」的绝妙园地。

来，与我手拉手一起前往吧？
profile.NA:
Let's get away from the hustle bustle of the daily life and head to the midst of nature.


Exactly for the fact that there is nothing there that this is a wonderful garden where you could freely create the best "fun".


Now then, shall we take each other's hand and depart?

profile.CN:
即使是在刺骨的霜冻中凝固的岁月，
编织智慧，酝酿策略，
这正是为了想出妙计而深思熟虑的时刻，
倒不如说是恰到好处。

静待梅花的绽开与新芽的气息。
正是这种清闲的气氛，
对军师来说，这才是万福的时刻。
profile.NA:
The days solidified into frost that pierces their skin, yet, they are rather advantageous moments to gather wits and cook up schemes, a prudent time to come up with a move to bring out success.


Let's restlessly wait for the plum flowers to unfurl and the sprouts to draw their spring breath.

This still and silent atmosphere itself might have been a period of happiness to the strategists.

profile.CN:
远方的嚎叫响彻高远的天空。

醒来的人啊，你在何方？
还在哪里顽强地存在吗？

尚未听见沉睡的鼻息。
又是被追赶到废墟那头的一个早上。
profile.NA:
The howl echo across the high and far away sky.


One who has come to your sense, are you here somewhere?

Are you still stubbornly existing somewhere?


I have yet to hear the sound of your slumbering breath.

Morning is still driven away beyond these ruins.

profile.CN:
——宝具，宝贝『打神鞭』。

过去接受封神的使命时，
赐予太公望的概念武装中的一种。
正如它的名字所示，是打击神明所使用的鞭子，
对于非比寻常的超常存在，特别是对于不会因寿命而终结的对象，
具有无与伦比的威力。

「这武器是不择对象的。
　用这个砸碎头盖骨的话，大多数敌人都会直接死亡吧。」

这是理所当然的。
如果你没有不死的特性的话，
头颅骨被打碎，大部分生物都会直接死亡吧。

这里所说的鞭子，既不是指细绳也不是指粗绳，
而是指用于打击的棒状武器。
对太公望来说，这使用起来比刀刃更加的得心应手。

「看，是不是很像钓竿呢……
　话虽如此，但比起刀刃来说。
　这鞭子乍一看也不像是一把武器，它的外型十分优美。
　该怎么说呢，对了——它不似刀刃那样野蛮！」

诚然如此。
对了，这个鞭子的使用方法是？

「主要是用来击碎敌人的头盖骨。」

这即是所谓的野蛮。
也是所谓的优美。
profile.NA:
―――Noble Phantasm, Baobei, "Gods-Smiting Whip".


A kind of Conceptual Weapon bestowed upon Tai Gong Wang when he received the mission to smite the Gods.

As its name implies, it is a whip to smite down the Gods, it boasts unrivaled power against extraordinary supernatural beings, especially those that don't have an end to their lifespan.


“It's a weapon that doesn't discriminate against its enemies, you know?

Smash it on their skulls and most enemies will die.”


Of course.

If they don't possess immortality, most living creatures would die when their skulls are smashed.


This whip here isn't a cord or a string, it's actually a rod-shaped weapon to strike.

To Tai Gong Wang, this is more familiar to him than a blade.


“See, it looks like a fishing rod......yeah, not exactly, but at least it's more similar to a fishing rod than a blade.

At a glance, it doesn't look like a weapon either, quite elegant.

How should I put this, right―――it's not barbaric at all!”


I see.

By the way, how do you use this whip?


"You smash the enemies in the head with it."


What even is barbaric?

And what is elegant?

profile.CN:
三头龙，妖龙·戈里尼奇。
嗯。
很厉害的。

在多布雷尼亚·尼基季奇的传说当中，
最有名的，也许就是降伏这头龙的故事了。
也就是说，我才是更厉害的那个。

嗯？
你说，
对妻子不管不顾，然后出门又是远征又是旅行，
这种壮士歌大概会更加有名？
这，这怎么……
可能呢……
我虽然是想这么说……
唔嗯。

我太太有什么想法？
嗯，这个嘛。
那当然是因为心爱的丈夫不回家，会很烦恼吧。
毕竟一点音讯都没有。

你说放在现代说不定会离婚？
这个问题——

「打扰一下可以吗？」

哦。怎么了大妖龙？
你这条龙，老是这么多话。

「为什么不是在聊我，而是在聊夫妻的话题？」

哈哈哈！
这么一说好像确实！
不过嘛，不要在意这些细节啦。
profile.NA:
The three-headed dragon Zmei Gorynych.

Yep.

It's very strong.


Among all legends of Dobrynya Nikitich, the most famous one might be the story about me exterminating this dragon.

In other words, I'm stronger.


Nn?

The Bylina about me leaving my wife behind to go on a journey or an expedition might be more famous, you said?

That, that kind of thing is......

Not true......

Is what I want to say but......

Mmmmm.


What do I think about my wife?

Hm, let's see.

It must have been tough for her that her beloved husband didn't come back.

After all, she didn't even get a single piece of news about him.


If it was the present time, she probably would have divorced him, I think?

That is―――


"Can I chime in for a bit?"


Oh. What's wrong, Zmei?

You have always been a talkative dragon, even back then as well, haven't you?


"Why are you talking about husband and wife stuff instead of talking about me?"


Hahhahhah!

Well, you don't have to put it like that!

But oh well, you know I'm not one to talk about trivial things!

profile.CN:
「NFF服务的企业理念？
  那自然是对诸位人类提供尖端的服务。
  不仅囊括衣食住行，还有梦想、希望、爱情、欲望。
  NFF被创造出来，就是为了满足这些可爱的需求。」

服务即是统治，
供给就是管理。
被商品化的“理想的服务”很快就会实现，
并成为人们生活的一部分，
把社会变得没有那些好处就难以维系。
她所追求的，
不是由人种、思想界定的国家，
而是由企业、经济构成的支配圈。

「由于物种的限制而导致的衰退是无法容忍的。
  愤怒、嫉妒、怨恨、辛酸。
  那些“坏东西”就由我们来买单。
  既然有我在，就不允许灭亡发生。
  大家只要不断地追求被给予的商品就可以了。」

在帽子攒动的巨大工厂里
商品被源源不断地生产出来。
家庭。成功。幸福。未来。
唯独名为『自由』的商品永远缺货。
美女暗自窃笑着，
将这颗星球上所有的动物玩弄于手中。

「话虽如此，还是不要太得意忘形。
  就凭人类的可能性是翻不出我这顶帽子的。
  闹得不愉快了，就把情绪放空，然后忘到森林里去吧。
  可千万别因为自己是个能干的孩子，
  就开始自满自大了哦？」
profile.NA:
"The corporate vision of NFF Services? That's of course radical servility to all of humanity. Not only for your necessities of life, but also for dreams, hopes, loves, and desires. NFF was created to answer all of your lovable needs."


Servility is domination and provision is management. When ideal services are commercialized, they eventually become a part of life, forming a society that can't go anywhere without being spoonfed. Her goal is not a nation defined by race or ideology, but a domination network defined by business and economy.


"It'd be absurd if the species declined for reaching its limits. To prevent that, I'll purchase everything bad about you. The anger, jealousy, grudges, and resentment. You're not allowed to extinct on my watch. All you need to do is to keep demanding the products I offer."


In that giant building that looks exactly like a hat, she's creating all new sorts of commodities. Homes. Success. Hopes. Futures. Only product, freedom, is eternally out of stock. The Beauty of Cherishment chuckles to herself as she leads all animals by the nose.


"That said, do not be conceited. Your potential is tiny enough to fit inside my hat. If you grow disrespectful, all I have to do is flip the hat over and dump you all in the forest. Never, ever dare think you're capable."

profile.CN:
青涩、无成、愚蠢。
每当看到这块碎片，她所想到的就是这些。

曾经，有一位她应当守护的王。
她得到了那位王在战场上负伤时所穿的外套。
每当看到那破碎的外套，足以灼烧她身体的愤怒与耻辱都在折磨着她。
以此为原动力，生前的她站上了无数的战场。

……直到现在，这份心情也没有改变。
但是，她也不否认其中渗入了其他的感情。
有一位想要与她分担自己的青涩与愚蠢的人存在，现在的她也无怨无悔地接受了。

怀揣着永不褪色的怒火、后悔，还有些许自豪，她依然在追逐着王的背影。
profile.NA:
Immature, unaccomplished, foolish.

That's what she thinks whenever she looks at this torn piece.


Once, she had a king that she needed to protect.

She was given the king's mantle when it was slashed by a sword on the battlefield.


Whenever she looks at the torn off mantle, she was tormented by burning rage and shame.

This was the driving force that pushed her to fight in numerous battles back when she was still alive.


......Even now, that still hasn't changed.

However, she cannot deny the fact that other emotions have shown through.

With a tolerable attitude, the she of the present accepts the fact that there is a human who shares her immaturity and foolishness.


With rage and regrets that never fades, and a little bit of pride, she continues to follow the king's back.

profile.CN:
马纳南·麦克·利尔持有的，能够在海上和陆地上奔驰的传说中的白马。有时它也会拉着战车。
马纳南是海神，因此也有说法认为这白马指的是海浪拍打出的白色泡沫。

「那是如同女神一般的我所使用的白马。
　简直是宝具级别的概念。
　啊，身为魔术师的我姑且也是会骑马的哦。
　在追赶封印指定对象的时候，视情况有时马比车
　和摩托更能派上用途。

　话虽如此……说到白马，就会有骑士和公主两人
　同乘的印象。该说是稍微有点过于浪漫了呢，
　还是该说太富有少女心了呢……不，我不是轻视
　的意思，只是稍微有点难为情……
　……总有一天我也……也不是没有可能……

　哎，你问对象？
　跟我同水平……就算不要求到那么高，该说希望会是个
　勇敢、博识、聪明、拥有统率力，被众人所喜爱，而且又
　不会因此而骄傲的谦虚的勇士吧……

　为什么听到这就离席了？
　太奢侈了？　只是在画饼充饥？
　不，会有的！　肯定会有的！　
　肯定只不过是我还没有遇到而已！」
profile.NA:
The legendary white horse owned by Manannán mac Lir, said to be able to run on both land and water. It is sometimes seen pulling a chariot too.

As Manannán is the God of the Sea, this white horse is thought to represent the white foam created by the billowing waters.


"The white horse used by the Goddess-like me, is it?

Truly a Noble Phantasm-rank Concept.

Well, as a mage, I can also ride a horse, more or less.

Depends on the situation, there are times a horse is more useful than a car or a bike when chasing a target designated for sealing.


Even so......a white horse makes me think of a Prince and a Princess riding on it together. It's a bit too romantic, or perhaps too girlish would be more apt......No, I don't mean to belittle it, rather, I'm just a little embarrassed......

......And it's not like I won't have...someone...in the future.....


Yes? What do I want in a partner?

I want a warrior who is brave, knowledgeable, wise, able to lead, loved by everyone.....not to mention, be my equal.....despite all that, they must not be haughty......


Why are you leaving?

Too excessive? A castle in the air?

No, that person exists! They definitely do! 

I just haven't met them yet, that’s all!"

profile.CN:

“King Pygmalion was not someone who would lay back and leave his servants to do everything for him.

That's why, even as the King's wife, I also possess domestic skills that I am not ashamed to show off.

然后，还有一样。
为恩情难以报答的御主，献上包裹肌肤的鹤氅布。
以爱纺织的本命织物，纯白以证她赤红的心。
玩闹般留下的羽毛边色如墨染，像是依依惜别的印记。

但是，不单单是感恩。
一定也包含着那之后产生的感情。
一切始于你亲手培育的希望。
profile.NA:
Two items from Miss Crane to return the favour.


The first one is Valentine's chocolates.

Sweet confections she made with an idol she calls friend and sings together with her.

They are soft, round nama chocolat, with lustrous coloured snow dusting as the finishing touch.

They make you think of rolling mayudama, young birds nestling in their nest, or the Pleaides of the Seven Sisters.


There is also another one.

A crane robe for Master, whom she holds an endless amount of gratitude for, to wear.

She put her true heart into weaving the beloved silk cloth, its pure white colour a testament of her devotion.

The spots of ink-dyed end feathers is black, a remnant of playful lingering affections.


They are not simply repayment.

They definitely hold feelings born after that.

After all, everything comes from the aspiration that you have nurtured.

profile.CN:
迷之偶像X〔Alter〕赠予的情人节巧克力。

看起来可爱、听起来愉快、吃起来也超好吃♪
唱片型巧克力♪
为了让御P稍微恢复元气，接下来是限定版打气歌的特别录制☆

「千万不能弄错顺序
  吃要等到最后。
  最后请出示好好吃光的证据。」
profile.NA:
Valentine's chocolate from Mysterious Idol X (Alter).


Cute to look at, fun to listen to, and also delicious to eat♪

It's a record-type chocolate♪


A special recording of a limited edition "Do your best" song to cheer MasP-san up a little☆


"Everything must be done in order, in which eating is the last step.

Please eat everything and destroy the evidence."

profile.CN:
摩根赠予的情人节巧克力。

是妖精国卡美洛的巧克力模型。
与阿尔托莉雅.潘德拉贡（Lancer）的巧克力概念相同。
最先做的是追求还原度的超极精密且细致的城堡，
但意识到「看起来会完全不像食物呢」，
就变成了童话感激增的设计。
摩根殿下的少女心，此时正闪闪发光。

城堡的前方，
『亲密的女王和公主』、『尚年幼的勇者将军』、
『两位可靠的骑士』以及『自言自语说着这个不行，但似乎还挺欣赏的大臣』
被做成棋子模样排列着。
profile.NA:
Valentine's chocolate from Morgan.


The chocolate is based off of Faerie Realm’s Camelot.

It shares the same concept with Artoria Pendragon (Lancer)'s chocolate. At first, it was a super elaborated and ultra-precise castle, one that strove to be as realistic as possible, however, after realizing that it "doesn't look like food", its design became more and more fairy-tale-like.

Her Majesty's maidenliness really shines through.


In front of the castle are figures made to look like chess pieces "The Harmonious Queen and Princess", "The Immature Brave General", 
"The Two Faithful Knights", and "The Minister who Somehow Doesn't Believe that I Appreciated Him" standing side-by-side.

profile.CN:
巴格斯特赠予的情人节巧克力。

巨大的盘子上堆满小小的巧克力，真是可爱的风景……话虽如此，仔细一看并不小，一个巧克力大概是一顿饭的量。

每个味道都不同，方便拿，很好吃。
手艺细致的巴格斯特，调理技术大放光彩。
可以的话，请务必吃掉三分之一。
profile.NA:
Valentine's chocolates from Barghest.


A large amount of small chocolates served in a big platter.

The sight sure is adorable...... However, upon closer inspection, they are not small at all. Each chocolate is as large as a meal.


Each and everyone of them has a different flavour, thus, they are delicious and easy to eat.

The cooking technique of the thorough Barghest sure shines through.

If possible, she wants you to eat at least one third of them.

profile.CN:
芭万·希赠予的情人节巧克力。

桩形巧克力。
用来将其他从者赠送的巧克力打碎，诅咒之桩。
是她花费时间和感情，首次制作的巧克力。
芭万·希完全不知道，这就是所谓的情人节巧克力。
虽然是故意让人不快的作品，但即便如此，为之加上蔷薇花纹，华美呈现的芭万·希，美感很强。
profile.NA:
Valentine's chocolate from Baobhan Sith.


It's in the shape of a stake.

A cursed stake that breaks through other Servants' chocolates.

It's also the first chocolate she made with her time and feelings.

That is the very essence of Valentine's chocolate itself, yet Baobhan Sith doesn't realize it.


Even though it was something made to harass Master, her aesthetic sense really shines through as she finished it up beautifully with the rose design.

profile.CN:
梅柳齐娜赠予的情人节巧克力。
模仿阿隆戴特的白色巧克力，和模仿……龙之宝珠的红色巧克力。

「宝剑和红玉！真是至高的组合！」

被叫做宝珠的红色巧克力，毫无疑问是心脏的形状。
将最重要的东西，心脏也交出的最强种，那独一无二的爱意无比汹涌。
宝珠巧克力里有御主一百年份的魔力，如果吃下去，就会昏睡整整一天。
那种事情我完全不在意。
（并非不理解）
梅柳齐娜天上天下唯我独尊的样子熠熠生辉。
profile.NA:
Valentine's chocolate from Mélusine.


The white chocolate is in the shape of Arondight and the red chocolate is in the shape of......the dragon's precious orb.

"The combination of the treasured sword and the ruby is definitely the most supreme set there is!"


Even though she calls it a precious orb, the red chocolate is definitely made in the shape of a heart.

The love of the strongest species sure is amazing, to them, an important thing = handing out their heart.

The magical power contained within the orb chocolate is enough for Master to use for 100 years.

If you were to eat that kind of thing, you would fall asleep for a whole day, yet she doesn't mind at all.

(Not that she doesn't know it) but Mélusine's "Throughout heaven and earth, I alone am the honored one" attitude shines through.

profile.CN:
珀西瓦尔赠予的回礼。

——美丽而又虚幻的，一朵花。

这是通过梅林的魔术，将珀西瓦尔
曾经见过的最美的花朵重现出来的东西。
据说，这是珀西瓦尔第一次得到圣枪时
在附近生长着的花。

根据歌剧『帕西法尔』，
他是在邪恶魔术师的城堡中获得了圣枪。
那么英灵珀西瓦尔曾经的经历
与歌剧的描述有没有区别呢。
难道说魔术师的城堡中装饰着花吗。
还是说他亲吻的魔女随身携带着花呢。

知晓这一答案的，只有珀西瓦尔自己。
profile.NA:
Valentine's return gift from Percival.


―――A single beautiful, yet short-lived, flower.

It was the most beautiful flower among those that Percival has seen, recreated by Merlin's magecraft.

It is said that this flower was nearby when Percival first picked up the Holy Lance.


According to the opera "Parsifal", he obtained the Holy Lance in the wicked mage's castle.

In that case, Percival's actual past is different from the opera?

Perhaps, the mage's castle was actually adorned with flowers?

Or maybe, it was the flower that the witch who kissed him brought along?


Only Percival himself knows the answer.

profile.CN:
光之高扬斯卡娅赠予的情人节巧克力。

能否发射出子弹取决于作为动力的爱情的真伪。
若被巧克力做的子弹射中，对手无疑会进入『魅惑』状态。

作为NFF服务项目提供毫无疑问也会大有人气，但不知道为何没有登载在产品目录上。是只在此期间限定的商品。
profile.NA:
Valentine's chocolate from Koyanskaya of Light.

Apparently if you the bullet hit your mark right in the heart, they would be "charmed".


If it was sold by NFF Services, no doubt that it would be very popular, however, for some reason, it isn't placed in the catalogue and is an item available for only this occasion.

profile.CN:
哈贝特洛特赠予的礼物。

哈贝特洛特的帽子，做成了主人公的尺寸。

Present from Habetrot.

profile.CN:
从冒充奥伯龙的人那里得到的礼物。

里面是触之即散的松软雪粒

怎么看都是『虚影之尘』。

「里面的东西已然失去了价值，
唯独容器的光辉，恒久不变，对吧？」
profile.NA:
Present from someone who pretended to be Oberon.


What was inside the cool-coloured container is powder snow that scatter apart when you pick it up......

No, it's not that at all, it's black dust that resembles soot.

No matter how you look at it, it's definitely Void's Dust.


It tastes salty when you lick it. Truly a tasteless reception. 


“Its content already lost their value, yet, somehow only the container's radiance remains unchanged, don’t you think?”

profile.CN:
冲田总司〔Alter〕(Saber)和炼狱赠予的情人节巧克力。
魔神小姐和炼狱连夜制作的巧克力。
魔神小姐和炼狱和御主，亲密地手牵着手，踏上了无比快乐又遥远的旅途。
但那一定是通往美丽天空的旅路。

话说回来，不知不觉就做了两个，到底是为什么呀，炼狱？
我才不知道呢。不，我知道但我不知道。没错吧，主人的御主？

————三人川字，午睡日和。
profile.NA:
Valentine's chocolate from Okita Souji (Saber Alter) and Rengoku.


Handmade chocolates by Majin-san and Rengoku, who worked all night to make them. They depict Majin-san, Rengoku, and Master getting along, holding hands, and having a fun and enjoyable journey on a faraway path. Nevertheless, it is no doubt a very wonderful trip to the sky.


By the way, I just realized it now but why is it that you made two of them, Rengoku?


No idea. Actually, I know, but I also don't know, just to be safe, I suppose. Hey, my master's Master.


―――Today is a fine day for afternoon naps, the three of us can sleep side-by-side.

profile.CN:
阿纳斯塔西娅(Archer)赠予的情人节巧克力。

很硬，总之就是很硬。这被魔眼压缩、凝缩而成的
美丽巧克力几乎就是永久冻土本身。
用锤子敲也好，用针扎也好，一点也不会碎。
而且，烈日下也不会融化，
放进沸水里也没用。
那么舔的话会变成什么样呢，把舌头贴了上去。
大事不好了。
「这下可怎么办呢」皇女陛下如此评价。
这应该是我的台词吧。
profile.NA:
Valentine's chocolate from Anastasia (Archer).


It's hard, completely solid even. This beautiful chocolate was condensed and compressed by Mystic Eyes is almost like permafrost itself, even when hit with a hammer or poked with a needle, you won't even leave a scratch on it.

On top of that, it doesn't melt under the blazing sun, nor when thrown into boiling water.

When asked what would happen if you lick it, apparently your tongue would stick to it and you're now in deep trouble.

"I wonder what I should do" was the Imperial Princess' comment.

That's our line.

profile.CN:
夏洛特·科黛(Caster)赠送的情人节巧克力。
用白巧克力做成的造型漂亮的鸽子。
有种拥有了生命般的跃动感。

吃的话肯定很好吃……。

profile.NA:
Valentine's chocolate from Charlotte Corday (Caster).


A stunning pigeon made from white chocolate, looking so lively as if it was alive.

Actually, it looks so lively that you could only think that it as being alive, thus, you just can't bring yourself t eat it so easily.

Even though it would definitely taste very delicious, since first-class ingredients were used liberally......

Corday's only commented that "Magic tricks sure are amazing, aren't they?"

That's my line.

profile.CN:
少女达芬奇（Ruler）赠予的情人节巧克力。

她将与恐龙们共度一夏的记忆，在巧克力蛋糕上尽情展现。
蛋糕是蓝色，也就是所谓的蓝色夏威夷。
「不吃就太浪费了！一起来吃嘛！」
她一边说一边将蛋糕切成小块，分给新所长和马修等人。大家边吃边热火朝天地聊起那个夏天的回忆。

这是我的宝物。
是和众人一同分享的，无可取代的回忆。

因为是仅此一夏，首屈一指的大冒险。
profile.NA:
Valentine's chocolate from the young Da Vinci (Ruler).


This chocolate cake represents the memories of the summer she spent with the Dinosaur.

Most of it is blue so maybe it has a, what do you call it, Blue Hawaii-ish taste or something.

"It would be a waste if we don't eat it, so let's do it together!" she said so cheerfully and cuts the cake, as we eat with the New Director and Mashu, we have a cheerfully heart-to-heart reminiscence about that summer.


This jewel is mine alone.

The irreplaceable experience I had with everyone.


The great adventure of one summer, the one only in the world that can’t be compared.

profile.CN:
迦摩（Avenger）赠予的情人节巧克力。

「哇哈哈哈！（未免太有身为魔王的自觉的笑声）
　在堕落之魔王准备认真一决胜负的时候，
　情人节什么的，简直就是最适合引诱人堕落的时机，
　有类似活动的存在真是不幸，
　你……绝对逃不掉哦。
　看，这个究极兵器。
　不但在本子上提前计划，还进行了事前模拟；
　对价格毫不理会地采购最好的食材；
　早起；
　一边偷偷地想着，御主会露出什么样的表情呢，一边制作。
　就算历经各种各样的陷阱也没有放弃，终于在深夜完成了……
　这个令人讨厌的手工巧克力！」

得意洋洋地将御主引入梦中的世界，却不知发生了什么，把巧克力塞进御主嘴里后就匆忙跑走了。
之后向她道歉的结果却是：

「……什，什么啊，你的眼神，那温柔的表情！？
　光是看着就感觉胸口像要爆炸了一样——！？
　哈，是时候准备给帕尔瓦蒂诅咒回礼了吧！？
　可、可恶——！」

防御力低的魔王大人红着脸，很是生气。
profile.NA:
Valentine's chocolate from Kama (Avenger).


"Fuhahahah! (Laughing in the most Demon King voice possible)

How unfortunate that an event called Valentine's Day, one that surely exists for the sake of corruption would happen just when the Demon King of Corruption decides to be serious, don't you think......?

I am definitely not going to let you get away.

Just look at my ultimate weapon.

This horrible handmade chocolate not only took all night to make, I also had to plan ahead, note it down and visualize it, procure the best ingredients without carefully paying attention to my budget, wake up early, sneakily do it by myself, work while imagining what kind of expressions Master will show me, and not give up even when I encountered various troubles.......!"


And she was fine with triumphantly dragging Master into the Dream World and all that, however, various things happened and she ended up shoving chocolates into Master's mouth then ran away.

Yet, she was still being thanked for it.


"What-What's wrong with you, looking at me so affectionately!? And why am I feeling like my heart is gonna explode just by looking at you!? What is this, Parvati even prepared a curse counter or something for you, didn't she!? The nerve of that-!"
It was said that the Demon King, who has low defense, turned bright red and went all sulky.

profile.CN:
凯妮斯（rider）的情人节回礼。
新鲜！
在加勒比海海边刚捕到的各种各样的鱼。
所有都是凯妮斯用鱼叉抓来的。
堆放在巨大的叶子上。

已经有很多了，别客气，吃吧！
profile.NA:
Valentine's return gift from Caenis (Rider).


So fresh!

All sorts of fishes just acquired from the Caribbean coast.

They were all spearfished by Caenis' harpoon.

They were put on a large leaf with a thud.


These are more than enough to go around, feel free to eat them!

profile.CN:
清少纳言（Berserker）赠予的情人节巧克力。

简直令人想起华丽又热闹的南国。
五颜六色的水果、冰淇淋，
都这样了还要往上堆的各种点心，
配料丰富到令人兴奋不已。
将这些一力支撑的整条吐司，
才是派对永远的主角，这就是蜜糖……
不对，不管怎么看都是巧克力。

但是，一个人吃这个肯定很无聊。
和为你制作的她一起亲密地分享吧。

＊

话说回来，上面的烟花棒到底有什么意义啊。
诺子小姐但笑不言。
profile.NA:
Valentine's chocolate from Sei Shounagon (Berserker).


Its gorgeousness and liveliness remind you of a Southern country.

The exciting toppings were an arrangement of colourful ice creams, fruits, and candies.

The whole piece of toast hold all of them up by its own.

This is the to-go choice in a party, honey...... No, it's not honey.

However you look at it, it's chocolate.


But, it would be really boring to eat this by myself.

Let's share it with the girl who made it and enjoy it together.

That way, it will be much more delicious.




By the way, I wonder what are the fireworks for?

Nagiko-san didn't give me any answers.

profile.CN:
雅克·德·莫莱赠予的情人节巧克力。

美食之都某老字号点心店的糕点师
在每晚强烈噩梦的侵扰下做出来的巧克力礼盒。
拷问般的痛苦，和升天般的甜蜜交相袭来。
活下去。

「感觉白兰地什么的会很适合呢。
　但是……你大概会选咖啡欧蕾吧？」
profile.NA:
Valentine's chocolates from Jacques de Molay.


An assortment of chocolates made by giving the pâtissier of a long-standing gourmet confectionery store in the capital nightmare every night.

You are assaulted by so much bitterness it’s like torture and such sickly sugariness you feel like ascending to heaven one after another. Live on.


"I think Brandy would go well with them.

But for you...... Café au lait would be better, wouldn't it?"

fandomLink: The Tragicomedy of the Templar Order

profile.CN:
芝诺比阿的情人节巧克力。　　
高大的棕榈科枣椰子树上生长的果实，干燥后称为椰枣（每100g约266kcal）
在外面再包裹上微苦的巧克力（可可豆含量约50%）做成的东西。
与她那一丝不苟且大胆的性格如出一辙，味道的平衡完美，甜和苦的交响曲绝妙地演奏着。而且，不过分华丽的外形和朴素的味道，让人不知不觉一直吃下去。
如此自然是手工制作。制作时，能看到有条不紊的材料的筹备、厨房的预约、事前的精神集中、没有浪费的手法、不掺恶念的过程、漂亮的善后收拾等等让其他从者们难以企及的贤妻良母作风。
途中，把她下厨的身姿与裸体围裙弄混的影之风纪委员长的袭击，是唯一最大的危机。
profile.NA:
Valentine's chocolates from Zenobia.


This dish was made from the dried fruits of a tall tree called Phoenix Dactylifera, which belongs to the Palmae family, in other words, dried dates (approximately 266 kcal per 100gr), coated in slightly bitter chocolate (approximately 50% cacao mass content).


Just like her serious yet daring personalities, their taste is perfectly balanced, an exquisite harmony of sweetness and bitterness, and yet, their humble and simple flavour naturally encourages you to eat more.


Of course, they were handmade, and during the process of making them, you could see the figure of a good wife and wise mother, who does not lose to any other Servants in terms of procuring the ingredients, reserving the kitchen, concentrating her focus beforehand, performing efficiently, not adding any evil arrangements, and tidying up completely, however......


The biggest problem she faced was being attacked by the President of the Public Moral Committee, who mistook her appearance while cooking as wearing a naked apron.

profile.CN:
伊丽莎白·灰姑娘赠予的情人节巧克力。
这次因为和御主一起制作，没有特别危险的部分，到不如说她的好品味发挥了作用，成就了各式各样的逸品。
还有，巧克力是南瓜味的。

伊丽莎白·灰姑娘轻松完成的御主的砂糖人偶大受好评，从其它从者那里接到了大量委托订单。
profile.NA:
Valentine's chocolate from Elizabeth (Cinderella).

profile.CN:
出云阿国赠予的情人节巧克力。
诸位盼望已久的新商品！终于发售！阿国座限定特制巧克力！作为歌舞伎的小装饰令人倍感亲切，这货真价实的日本风格肯定也会在全世界引爆流行！
嘛，只是试作品啦。如此，不才小女阿国，拙劣之作，难表心意，倘为御主笑纳，幸甚。
―――以此为开场白，出云阿国的恋歌歌舞伎。
profile.NA:
Valentine's chocolate from Izumo no Okuni.


The new product that you have been waiting for! Is, finally, here! The chocolates made specifically for Okuni Theatre only! I have a hunch that it will be popular worldwide due to it having a real Japan-ist presence, in addition to it being a familiar accessory in Kabuki!


Well, this is still just a trial product though.

Thus, this one was actually handmade by Okuni-san, who hopes for Master's kind understandings, and if you would accept it, she would be very happy.


―――With this, the Kabuki of Izumo no Okuni's love song begins. How will it turn out?

profile.CN:
谜之兰丸X赠予的情人节巧克力。

兰丸星自太古以来就存在的传统点心，经历了流行落伍流行落伍的数度循环。和美味巧克力一样值得期待的是里面的兰丸贴纸。

如果你是兰丸的主人，就必须收集穿着白色紧身衣的兰丸Z、绝对胜利小姓兰丸V、最终战斗规格的大兰丸G等等才行哦，主人！

顺便一提，吃完一块巧克力后，再打开下一袋。这是主人与兰丸之间的约定哦！
profile.NA:
Valentine's chocolates from Mysterious Ranmaru X.


They are traditional Western confectioneries that have gone through cycles of popularity and obsoletion since ancient time on Ranmaru Planet. Along with the delicious chocolates, you can look forward to the Ranmaru stickers inside.


There are the Ranmaru Z in a tight white suit, the Absolute Victory Page Ranmaru V, or the Great Ranmaru G during Final Decisive Battle, if you are Ranmaru's Master, you need to collect all of them, My Lord!


By the way, you must finish the chocolate before you can open the next pack. That is the promise between Master and Ranmaru!

profile.CN:
坂本龙马（Lancer）和阿龙小姐的回礼。

龙马戴着的白色帽子。虽说是为了隐藏真名而戴的帽子，但实际上也是龙马的爱好之所在。尽管是讲究的定制款，但好像也有那么几个备用品的样子。

高千穗的白色大蛇的鳞片。闪耀着洁白的光辉，如宝石般美丽的鳞片。据说持有这块鳞片的人，能够拥有一生一次的役使白色大蛇的机会。

即使与全世界为敌，那个誓约也仍将伫立于此。
profile.NA:
Return gift from Sakamoto Ryouma (Lancer) and Oryou-san.


The white hat that Ryouma wore. While it's true that it is a hat Ryouma wore to hide his true name, it is also something he likes. Even though it is a special order made, it seems he owns several spares.


The scale of the Great Serpent Takachiho. A white, shining scale so beautiful it makes people think they were looking at a precious gem. It is said that those who possess this scale can command the White Great Serpent once throughout their entire life.


Even if the world became your enemy, this oath will remain with you forever.

profile.CN:
圣诞玛尔达的情人节赠礼。
德国的点心面包，史多伦！
和为了圣诞晚会派对奔走的时候，一起做的那个史多伦有点不同。
这次貌似稍微改变了菜谱。

也就是说……
为了情人节！
加了很多巧克力碎！
「多吃点！
但是为了不变成蛀牙，要好好刷牙哦？」
profile.NA:
Valentine's gift from Santa Martha.


It's Stollen, a German’s sweet bread!

This one is a bit different from the Stollen that we made together with great efforts during Christmas.

It seems the recipe was changed just a tiny bit this time.


Because it is......

Valentine's arrangement!

A lot of chocolate chips were kneaded in the bread!


"Please eat a lot!

And make sure you brush your teeth properly to avoid teeth decay, okay?"

profile.CN:
太公望的情人节回礼。

壁立千仞，浓云叆叇。
堤岸边，水平如镜。
「好安静啊。
　不觉得……是宛如仙境一般的风景吗？」
太公望这么说着，真伪难辨。

此处貌似是——对太公望来说，绝佳的钓鱼之所。
但他似乎又不想钓鱼的样子。
他说，我要钓王侯。
鱼呢？不钓了吗？

「当然要钓啦。
　你想吃鱼，对吧？」
原来是这样。

顺带一提，这里似乎是他生前（？），
曾与妻子一同前来的地方——
profile.NA:
Valentine's return gift from Tai Gong Wang.


The bank of a gentle mountain stream under a tall mountain and trailing clouds.


"Makes you feel calm, doesn't it?

Don't you think this scenery somehow......reminds you of the fairyland?"

Said Tai Gong Wang, however, it is unclear whether it was the truth or not.


It seems to Tai Gong Wang, this place is―――the ideal fishing spot.

However, he says that he wasn't fishing for fishes, but King and Princes.

What about fishes? You are not going to fish for them?


"Of course I will.

Because those are the thing you will eat, yes?" I see.


By the way, apparently, he often brought his wife to this place back when he was alive (?)―――

profile.CN:
多布雷尼亚·尼基季奇赠予的情人节礼物。

和本人的武具同为大马士革钢所制的一把短剑。
为了在战斗中不会伤手，仔细地给刀柄安装了护手。

——为了生存而使用吧。
——生存，即为战斗。

当初直视着尼基季奇的双眼，听到的这句话
现在仍存于心。

「你用上那玩意了吗？
　什么？没有白刃战的机会？
　哎呀，不是那样。
　那个，那把短剑啊，吃饭的时候也能用上。
　是……就是如此啦。
　不必认为是太高级的东西。
　虽然用了大马士革钢那样的好材料，更随意一点地使用也不错吧！」
以上——
这就是那之后和尼基季奇的对话。
profile.NA:
Valentine's gift from Dobrynya Nikitich.


A small dagger made from Damascus steel, the same as her armour. 

It has a sturdy guard to prevent your hands from getting injured during battles.


―――Use it to live.

―――Because to live is to fight.

Those words that Nikitich said while looking straight ahead at you remains in your heart, even now.


"Have you been using it?

What? You don't have any armed combat opportunities?

Oh no, no, nope.

That isn't what I meant, yeah.

You see, you can also use a dagger to eat.

That......what?

You don't need to think of it as some kind of impressive thing.

Even though it was made of good Damascus Steel, it is something that you can use for more normal purposes, you know!" Is what Nikitich said―――afterward.

profile.CN:
暗之高扬斯卡娅赠予的情人节巧克力。

成熟女性所赠送的，哪怕在高档品牌中也是最上级的巧克力。
虽然并非她亲自手工制成，但却是由品牌设计师和工匠
在被囚禁的数日里从零开始制作的高级品，
在某种意义上也可以说是『至高无上的手作巧克力』。

因为御主完成了连能干的美女秘书也觉得非常困难的工作，
其中包含了对御主的称赞与嘲笑，
以及亲爱之情。
profile.NA:
Valentine's chocolate from Koyanskaya of Darkness.


A luxurious brand top grade chocolate, really a gift from an adult woman.

While it isn't handmade, it is Haute couture made from scratch by detaining brand's designers and craftsmen for a few days, so you can say it means "A Supreme Handmade" item.


It is loaded with the admiration, ridicule, and deep affections for Master, who has managed to carry out the most difficult, even from the capable beautiful secretary’s point of view, tasks.

profile.CN:
赫费斯提翁赠予的情人节巧克力。
都说了，如果我出手，当然会变成这样。
王的雕像，并且有少年期和全盛期，正可谓是双重盛宴。
比例什么的全部靠目测，连一根头发都不会有偏差，她是这么说的。

另外，虽然看起来是这样，味道却是顶级的。
这是领会到现代料理精髓的她，不惜一切代价拼命钻研的结果。为什么要如此竭尽全力呢，恐怕是生前开始就从未改变过的习惯吧。
profile.NA:
Valentine's chocolate from Hephaeston.


A sculpture of the King, as if to say "It is obvious that if I were to make any, it would be this".

It is of the double prime of his life, during his youth and heyday.

Even though the proportions were eyeballed, not even a single strand of hair is out of place.


Also, even though it looks like this, its taste is of first-class good.

This is the result of her research, which she spared no expenses for, after she is awaken to the sophistication of modern cuisine.

The way she rushed into this with all her might, to the point you want to question why, is probably something that hasn’t changed about her since she was still alive.

profile.CN:
马纳南·麦克·利尔〔巴泽特〕的情人节赠礼。

把从俵藤太那采购的美味大米蒸熟，
之后用刺拳、直拳、勾拳、上勾拳、前踢、膝踢、
回旋踢和斩剜战神之剑等料理方法，
将米粒反复捣至完全失去形状，
里面包入红豆馅，就完成了这道独创和风甜品。

她自豪地说，隐藏的秘方是在冲击的瞬间加入进去的。
profile.NA:
A gift from Manannán mac Lir (Bazett).


They are original Japanese desserts with red bean paste filling, the outside was made from the delicious rice acquired from Tawara Touta, which was then steamed, jabbed, straight punched, hooked, uppered, front kicked, knee stroke, roundhouse kicked, fragarached, per the recipe, until the rice grains lost their shapes.


She proudly revealed that the secret ingredient is to add a screw move at the moment of impact.

profile.CN:
玛修赠予的情人节礼物。
习惯送别的她为归来之人倾尽真心制作的，小小的小小的巧克力塔。
上面细致的装饰不仅显露了想尽力款待对方的心情，更将制作者日日刻苦修炼的技术尽数体现。
疲惫的身体渗入淡淡的甜味，再度涌上了力量。
玛修作为甜点师的技术，也许又迈进了一大步也说不定…御主这样想。
profile.NA:
Valentine's gift from Mashu.


She, who has seen many people off, made these petite chocolate tarts with all her heart for those who are coming back.


Looking at the detailed toppings, not only you could feel her desire to warmly welcome the other parties, but also the skills of her craftsmanship after they have been polished day after day shining through.


The sweetness and softness spread through your exhausted body, and the strength to rise up again swell from within.

A thought came to Master's mind......that Mashu could perhaps grow even more as a pâtissier.

profile.CN:
被诅咒的尸骨残骸。
不祥地耸立着，几乎要覆盖天空。
profile.NA:
A debris of cursed bones.

It towers ominously, to the point it covers the whole sky.

profile.CN:
漫无目的地闲逛到一家酒吧时，
我遇到了一位带有奇特氛围的男子。
他带着嘲讽一般的语气，
轻快地说自己刚结束了一项大工作。

「我说，你是艺术商人吧？　从你的视线看出来的。
　你在习惯性地寻找这个店里最美的东西。」

男人对绘画很了解。
这可以称得上是奇妙的缘分了吧。
我们开始讨论这条街上的美术馆里的一幅画。提香的《天上的爱与人间的爱》。

「其实，我是个艺术白痴啊。
　我不懂什么是美。
　伟大的东西。整齐的东西。尊贵的东西。
　我明白什么东西是做得很好的，但也仅此而已了。
　我感受不到人人都在说的“爱”这个玩意儿啊。」

所谓的美，即为给人带来爱，或者说被赋予了爱的东西。
而男人似乎感受不到那份喜悦与充盈。

「美应该是过去式的。
　在失去之时。在损伤之时，才注意到
　这对自己来说是无可替代的。
　这不是称赞，而是哀悼。正是因为无法挽回，
　才会比任何东西都美丽。」

我没有表示赞同。
要说为什么的话，是因为——

「嗯。没错，兄弟。
　在为了感受爱而伤害到它的那一刻，
　我爱过的形式就会消失不见。
　一切都毫无意义。没有救赎，也没有回报。
　那么，从一开始就不该去爱，不是吗。」

男人像说着什么笑话一样，从座位上站起。
——仿佛让人联想到死亡一般，远处传来救护车的声音。
profile.NA:
I dropped by a bar where I met a man with a mysterious aura.

Just finished a job, the man casually mentioned. Mockingly, even.


“You’re an art dealer, aren’t you? I can tell from your gaze.

You’re looking for the most beautiful object in this establishment out of habit.”

The man was well-versed in the subject of paintings.

A strange coincidence, one might say.

He and I had a discussion about a painting on display at one of the museums in this city. [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Titian Titian]’s [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sacred_and_Profane_Love Sacred and Profane Love], specifically.


“To be honest with you, my appreciation for art could use some work.

I don’t understand what is beautiful.

When it comes to celebrated pieces, well-composed works, or even sublime creations, I can tell for sure that those were made to a high standard of workmanship. But that’s it.

I can’t feel the so-called ‘love’ that society speaks of.”


Beauty is the reciprocity of giving and receiving love.

Apparently, this man can’t experience such joy and satisfaction.


“Beauty should be in the past tense.

Only when you lose or damage something do you realize how irreplaceable it was to you.

That’s lamentation, not appreciation. What makes it more beautiful than anything else is the fact that you will never get it back.”


I couldn’t agree with him.

Because that’s—


“Yep, I get what you’re trying to say. And you’re right, my friend.

Any proof of my love is lost the moment I harm to feel love.

Completely meaningless, I tell you. No salvation, no recompense to be found.

So it’s actually pretty simple then: Just don’t love in the first place.”


The man replied as if he’s telling an amusing story, then he left his seat.

―In the distance, an ambulance’s siren was blaring, evoking the image of death.

profile.CN:
「我还没醉到会参与这种胡闹、
　不过就满足你吧。因为是王子。
　但是、可以不要期待甜蜜的展开吗？」

「为一直跋涉的你送来了乐园的香味。
　啊啊、蔷薇虽美但请放心。
　花上没有恼人的刺，对吧？」

是于春之园中玩耍的你。
是被囚禁在夜之帐中的你。
仅此一夜的共演。
profile.NA:
Oberon • Vortigern: "I'm not daft enough to join in on the revelry, but I'll oblige in your request. I am a prince, after all. But don't expect any sweet developments from me, okay?"


Merlin: "Let the fragrance of paradise reach you as you continue to walk down your path. Ah, the roses are indeed beautiful but you need not worry. My flowers don't have any bitter and prickly thorns on them."


To the one who frolics in the garden of spring.

To the one who is trapped in the veil of the night.

I ask that you perform together for one night only.

Cu Chulainn: "What’s the matter, Archer? You must be losing your touch as a sniper if you’re getting hit by a spearman’s gun of all things!"

Gilgamesh: "Hah, he must have been in the kitchen for too long. Constantly laboring away, for three full meals a day plus dessert!"

EMIYA: "Your surprise attack after hiding in the shallow water took me aback! And what’s more, you even have the latest state-of-the-art water gun! Seems like that spear you love to brag about has reached the end of its life!"

Cu Chulainn: "Hah, I only got this to match yours! I borrowed this from the Saber in the green cape!"

Gilgamesh: "Wha–?! Impossible, I’ve been sending petitions to loan it every five minutes, why are you the one in possession of the King of Knights’ gun?! And who gave you permission to enter this establishment when I exclusively reserved it in the first place?!"

Cu & EMIYA: "(The younger) You did."


"Waku Waku Zabuun" is a recreational area where citizens can come to relax.

In a corner, a water gun battle between an odd group of Heroic Spirits seems to have broken out…?

profile.CN:
「永别了。名侦探……」

在欧洲各地撒下犯罪网络的巨大组织。
侦探和一名把头目的悬赏金当做目标，自称是极其普通的商人的男子相遇，一起辗转于各地。

最后找到的黑幕，居然是自己的熟人。
侦探站在男子消失的悬崖边，喃喃自语。

「开什么玩笑……
要是逃去地狱，那我也要追到地狱。
要把一切画上句号！这就是侦探（我）的工作！」
「怎么能半途而废。
我就奉陪到底吧。」

―――这就是，作为侦探的最后的事件。
profile.NA:
Amakusa: "Farewell, Mr. Detective..."


A huge organization comprised of many crime networks through Europe.

Detective Edmond travels around the country with a man who claims to be an ordinary trader, who contacted him for the bounty on the ringleader of that organization.


When I finally found him, the mastermind turned out to be a familiar face from the past.

That is what the detective mutters as he stands on the very cliff where that man disappeared.


Edmond: "Don't fuck with me......

If you runaway to hell, then hell is where I will go!

Because closing the curtains is a detective's (my) job!"

Columbus: "This is the ship that I got on, so I'll be sailing it with you until the very end."


――This will be his last case as a detective.

mcLink: 侦探爱德蒙～最终事件篇～

profile.CN:
「犯人好像往小巷里逃了……
　这里要慎重前进，前辈。」
「哎呀哎呀，后辈。不要太紧张了。
　这种程度的话随便干干就行啦。」

为了解决事件，被匆忙安排在一队的两人。

虽然两人有着不同出身和经历，
却都有着向往正义的心——
profile.NA:
Percival: "It seems the culprit has escaped through the back alley...We should be careful, Senpai.”

Saito: "Now, now, my dear kouhai. No need to be so stiff. It's better to just do whatever comes to mind when it comes to these kinds of things."


These two were suddenly paired together to solve a case.


They may come from different origins and backgrounds, but they are united in their desire to pursue justice―

Tai Gong Wang: “So, my young lord. What can I do for you tonight? Are you trying to befriend me, perhaps?”

Lanling Wang: “What is your intent behind covering everything up like that again? Did you think I would not notice the barbaric acts you have fabricated?"


Rumor has it that bandits have appeared in the capital.

The ones who have been targeted, however, have been powerful people who line their own pockets, merchants who misuse their authority, and the scoundrels who act as their hunting dogs―


The young lord finally arrived at the residence of the mastermind believed to be a Taoist.

The piercing eyes of the old soldier stationed in the back stare pointedly at the young lord who appeared to question the Taoist’s true motives.


Li Shuwen: “If you do not have the resolve, it’d be best for you to leave.”


The young man stared at the sake cup he held in his hand, before drinking its contents down in one gulp.

profile.CN:
看着借列车之旅留下回忆的乘客
列车员露出腼腆的笑容。

「客人哟，搭乘感受还好吧。
　如有需要，请尽管说。」
「谢谢。这客房真是好极了。
　旅行期间就交给你了。」

看门人微笑地照看着他们。
因为他知道列车员直到今天都在做着真挚的准备。

「真是个明朗的开始呀。
　愿我等的旅途有伟大的幸运相助…！」
profile.NA:
The conductor smiles modestly at the passengers as they reflect upon their train journey.


Karna: "Esteemed Guest, I hope you are enjoying your ride. If you need anything, please don't hesitate to ask."

Zhuge Liang: "Thank you. This cabin is simply wonderful. I'll be in your care for the rest of the trip."


The porter watches over the scene with a smile.

It's because he knows that the conductor has been working diligently to prepare for this day.


Rama: "A bright start, indeed. Best of luck on our journey...!"

profile.CN:
「这是永远不会怀疑明天来临的
　因你们人类的傲慢导致的结局。
　本是圆环的道路，渐渐地，找到了终点站」

在银河的尽头发生的扭曲之下
如同锁链一般被扭转的人类历史，
如今，迎来了终结。

「我，我们！
　要用自己的双手选择（应对）未来！」
「海鸟，向往陆地（希望）。
　纵使前方天空雷云密布。」

他们编织出的许多牵绊，
究竟能否平安无事地救济世界呢！？
profile.NA:
Enkidu: "This is what the pride of you humans have brought upon yourselves, who never doubted that tomorrow would always come. This circular path has finally reached its terminus.”


The history of mankind, which has been twisted like a chain by the strain generated at the edge of the galaxy, is now coming to an end.


Paris: “I–no, we–are going to decide (deal) our future ourselves!”

Nemo: “Seabirds always aim for land (hope). Even if there are thunderclouds in the sky ahead.”


Will the numerous bonds they weave be able to save the world and keep it safe?!

profile.CN:

不知道在旁人眼里是什么样子，不过他们总是像这样关系很好的样子。大概。
profile.NA:
Caenis: “Yo, Mandricardo. Didya know? There’s a 50 yen discount on meat buns today.”

Mori Nagayoshi: “I got paid from my part-time job today. I’ll bring some juice and treat you, so you better stop by, aight?”

Who knows how this scene looks to someone passing by, but this is just how they get along. Maybe.

profile.CN:
「嗯嗯嗯嗯嗯嗯！　　
　……稍微有些偏右了吧。真是挥不出精妙的一球啊。」
「嗯，好球！虽然看起来有点古怪，进攻方式却很光明正大的啊，道满！

profile.CN:

但是，征侧有时也能感觉到。
看到这些孩子们，我就想要加油。虽然我们还有很多不足之处，但能感受到我们正被他人所需要着。
像这样给予我们力量，和以前的“大家”有着同样的眼神―――也会这样想。

Pon：日语的大象叫。同时在网络流行语里表达因为悲伤或激动想哭的心情。
profile.NA:

No one knows the answer.


......However, sometimes, Trung Trac has this feeling.

That when these ones are watching, she could work harder.

She could feel that there were people who depends on them, even if they are still lacking in many ways.

Sometimes, she thinks that they have the same eyes as "everyone" who gave them strength back then―――

For that reason, she has wondered if these ones could have been "everyone".

She isn't so sure about it.

But in any case.


"Regardless of their true identity, they are very cute, not only they are always there with us, they also think of us as important partners, toot!"

"Absolutely, toot. If you're done worrying, let's get back to our noses nuzzling game, toot!"

"I'm not gonna lose! Tooot!"

"Wah!? N-nothing at all? I wasn’t pretending to be two different people talking to each other or anything, not at all?"

profile.NA:

The earth is where I belong.

I have never questioned that fact.


And yet, whenever I awaken, the sight that bursts into my eyes has always been―――the sky, where this lump of flesh cannot reach.


At least once, I would like to try something called "basking in the sun" under that free sky.


That is what I was thinking of.

profile.CN:
我被那片海所囚禁。
被海浪裹挟着随波逐流、心慢慢变成空洞、风化。
渐渐什么都感觉不到。埋在土中、一点点地死去。
然后、然后我的一切什么也不剩了、被人们忘记了。
为什么逃不掉。明明谁都认为我不重要。
profile.NA:
I was trapped within that ocean.


As I'm jostled around by the waves, my heart gradually got thinner and worn down.

I became unable to feel anything.

Buried within the earth, I died bit by bit.

And then, there was nothing left, and I was forgotten.

Why didn't I just run away? There was no one that needs me after all.

profile.CN:
在干架中输掉也好，在决斗中败下阵来也罢。
不过，在国与国之间的战争中失败了，大抵就会是这样的。
消逝了的人们的生命，被拖走的奴隶。
大家一同构筑起来的，一同经历体味的人生
就这样被弃之于无物，随后消逝无踪。

没有再稍微有那么一点，一点不同就好的道路吗。
我不禁思考起这种毫无意义的事情。
你的的确确还存在于此。
但是……你还留这里亦无意义可言。
因为，理应守护的事物已经不再。

我那令人无比自豪的城墙，不败的三重防御墙啊。
不要哭泣。哭泣是只许给理当被守护的民众的权利。
愤怒吧。如修罗般、如罗刹般地愤怒吧。
那才是许给你我的权利。
profile.NA:
It's okay to lose the fight, and even to lose the skirmish.

But, this is usually how it is to lose in a war with another country.

Everyone's lives disappearing, slaves being dragged away.

Everything that everyone built up together, the time they spent together, all of it is regarded as utterly meaningless, and disappears.


Just a bit more, just a bit longer and it would've been different, wouldn't it?

I think such worthless things.

Certainly, you do as well.

But... there's no meaning in you remaining there.

That which should have been protected has already been reduced to nothing.


My proud citadel walls, my invulnerable three-layered bulwarks.

There's no need to cry. Crying is a right afforded only to the civilians that we protect.

Instead, get angry. Like a raging asura, like a furious rakshasa, get angry.

That is the right that you and I are permitted.

profile.CN:
荡漾着太古记忆的贝壳的涡旋。
那宛若低语的声响，如尚未褪色般鲜明。
profile.NA:
A whirlpool of seashells where memories of ancient times gather again and again.

profile.CN:
于深山舞动的不灭火炎的花串。

profile.NA:
A flower tassel of immortal flame fluttering through the mountain deeps.

profile.CN:
那是无比漫长的———漫长的冬天。
或许，就那样一直被冰封下去，
会更轻松也说不定。

但是，也知晓了误解、后悔、挫败
才是必经之事。

并非是为了哪个人。
就算力所不及也不会放弃。
即便无法取得胜利也不会移开目光。

去成为那样的人本身才是不被天赋眷顾之人的战斗，

profile.NA:
It was a long, long winter.

Perhaps staying frozen would have been the easy way out.


But mistakes, regrets, and defeat taught him exactly what he must accomplish.


Do it not for another’s sake.

Never give up even if the task is beyond your capability.

Never turn away even if you don’t stand a chance of winning.


“That is how the non-innately gifted fight.”

Those hands covered in scars were a testament to it.


The night is over.

Like a chrysalis undergoing metamorphosis, the wolf sets out.

profile.CN:
其为理当统率之人。
一切有为之光悉皆俯首称臣，尽此一心。

盈满于月下，宿业已结出硕果。

持以五大元素，稀见罕有的宝石于此抵达究极。

Revealing the secrets of magecraft.

profile.CN:
杀害己身的噩梦的具现。

前进。

去超越那道背影——那赤红之风。
profile.NA:
It is the realization of the nightmare that kills oneself.

I put my power into the punishments that restrict it.


Even though I fear that I will one day forget even the words that I vow to abide, still.

For as long as I have things that I cannot give up on.


Go forward.

Even then, go forward.

Go beyond that back―――go beyond the red wind.

To sum it up, to him, life is a resource.
