Although, not even a single thing is compensated to "the things" that were consumed themselves.

The Alimango girl smiles like an innocent, pure white flower.


She is, forever and ever, basks in the dazzling sunlight and the gentle sound of the waves at the land of a faraway memory.

profile.CN:
——这是理所当然的事情。
去帮助他人。
身为良善之人就要做的事。
那就是在骑士身份之前，作为一个人的最基本的存在方式。

想要踏足大地。
想要大口呼吸。
想要大声呼喊，
想要放声欢笑。
啊啊——归根究底，我的愿望，其实就是这样的事情。

——令人讨厌啊，真的是。
我明明，不应该拥有如此幸福的终结的。

——这是一幅梦想的绘画。
珍重着令心胸雀跃、心意相合、心绪交叠的欢欣，绝对不可能存在的一众世界的模样。
然而你仍然在脑海中描绘。
将那飞越了空想，畅游过原野，由无可替代之人携来的辽远阔达之风毫无保留地迎入怀中。
那般，不值一提的日子。
profile.NA:
―――It’s a matter of course.

Helping people.

Be a good person.

Before being a knight, that’s the fundamental way a person should be.


I want her to step foot upon this land.

I want her to take a deep breath.

I want her to laugh and to shout out loud.

Ahh―――At the end of the day, that is all I want.


―――Seriously though, I hate this.

There is no way I could have this kind of happy ending.


This is the painting of a dream.

The image of worlds that cannot exist, where you are excited, your hearts brought together, and the joy of exchanging affections is treasured.

And yet, you can see it.

Flying over fantasies, playing in the fields, and instead of going against the magnanimous wind brought about by the irreplaceable people, they embrace it.

Going about such silly days.

mcLink: 将祈祷的明灯高举心间
fandomLink: Keep a Prayer Burning in Your Heart

profile.CN:
这就是我的剑，咎瓦尤斯！
怎么样，很帅吧！
根据故事里的说法，好像一天能变色30次，
还有剑柄里收纳了圣枪什么的
哎呀总之是有很多传说的剑。

不过，说到底。
最主要的问题还是在于它能斩什么人，不能斩什么人吧。
王之剑、勇者之剑也可能会因为持剑者
而变为魔之剑、愚者之剑啊。

因此，我持剑的时候总是会向同伴发问。
「现在的我是不是很帅？」
之类的！

目前来看，因为我还没被说过不够帅气，
那就先当作是事实了！
profile.NA:
This is my sword, Joyeuse!

Pretty cool, isn't it!?

According to the stories of legends, it changes colours 30 times a day, and it also has the Holy Lance put away within its hilt, well, it's a sword of many origins.


However, at the end of the day.

The real question is who you can and cannot kill with it, isn't it?

Ultimately, whether it is the sword of a king, the sword of a hero, the sword of the demon, or the sword of the fool depends on its wielder.


Therefore, whenever I hold this sword, I would ask my companions, "Do I look cool right now?".

Just kidding!


Until now, no one has ever told me that I’m uncool, so that’s that!

fandomLink: A King's Blade, A Hero's Blade

profile.CN:
无与伦比的开放感。
无与伦比的解放感。
看啊，那明媚的阳光，那闪耀的苍穹，
白云飘舞，草木欣欣向荣。
（虽然后背和身上各处隐约传来阵阵刺痛）

多么爽快的感觉。这就是人类应有的状态。
在这世界上，只要像这样把一切都暴露出来的话，
大概一切都可以迎刃而解。
尽管如此，也有解决不了的事情。
就比如说，当下困扰我的问题——



糟了，衣服不知道去哪了啊！！
profile.NA:
A tremendous feeling of freedom.

A tremendous feeling of liberation.

Look, the sun is shining, the blue sky is bright,

The white clouds are lingering, and the plants are full of life.

(Though my back and a number of other things are tingling.)


What an exhilarating feeling. This is exactly how human beings ought to be.

If you expose everything like this, you can resolve just about anything in this world.

However, not all things can be resolved.

Take for example, my current predicament―


Shit, where'd my clothes go?!

profile.CN:
是啊，这就是莱恩的黄金。
我曾经的丈夫，我的夫婿，曾为王子，曾为冒险者的
那个齐格飞拥有过的招来毁灭的秘宝。

知道我拘泥于这个宝物的原因吗？
呵呵，想不明白也不用勉强————
“因为想破坏”？
……没错。
是的，无关紧要。无关紧要啦。
再珍贵的魔术道具
对我来说也只是黄金。
早点融化掉做成金币就好了。
御主，你也要小心。
令人目眩的黄金也会让人神迷。
亲近的人可能会背叛。
可能会想要背叛亲近的人。

所以，这种时候有一个简单的对策。
因为是无关紧要的东西，爽快地用掉就好。

使用掉，分送掉的话诅咒和灾厄都会消失。
这就是，世人称作被诅咒的黄金之物。
profile.NA:
Well, this is Das Rheingold.

Of my ex-husband, ex-husband, ex-prince, ex-adventurer

It's a doomed treasure that Siegfried got.


Do you know why I was particular about this treasure?

Fufu, it's not unreasonable if you don't understand ---


"I wanted to destroy it"?


...... Correct answer.

Yes, it didn't matter. I didn't care.

Even if it’s magically valuable,

It's just gold for me.

I should have melted it into gold coins.


Master, be careful too.

The dazzling gold will dazzle your heart.

A close person may betray you

You may want to betray a close person.


Therefore, I will teach you simple measures in such a case.

It doesn't matter, so use it quickly.


By using and sharing, the curse and disaster will disappear.

That is what is cursed and golden.

profile.CN:
人类的伟大在于数字。
加、减、乘、除。
以此为基础，世间任何大小，距离皆可测量。
若没有数字，一切存在皆是虚无。

并且，数字也会引起恶的性质。
杀死一百个人，就能拯救一千个人的话。
愿意背负这种罪的人一定存在。
像野兽一样单纯明快地生活
懂得计算的人类是做不到的。

故而，合乎逻辑之恶。
于此显现的便是其集合体。

以上是詹姆斯・莫里亚蒂的数学讲义。
要好好提交报告哦！
profile.NA:
It can be said that the greatness of humanity lies in numbers.
Add, subtract, multiply, and divide.
With those fundamentals, something's dimensions, the length of an interval, everything can be measured.
Every conceivable existence is nothing without numbers.

Yet, at the same time, numbers evoke malignancy.
Killing a hundred people may save a thousand others.
It will always be the case that some people will carry that sin.
It's no longer possible for humans to live in a simple and clear manner, like beasts do.

Ergo, they are logically malignant.
And what is here is the aggregation of that.

That's James Moriarty's maths lecture.
Please hand in your report on time!

profile.CN:
哦，我惹人怜爱的公主，杜尔西内娅啊！
在下拉曼查的堂吉诃德，
在大冒险的同时，也让您那惹人怜爱而又高洁的身姿，
为世人所知晓了！

嗯，对于一起旅行的可爱的女仆，
您还有什么话想说吗？
话说……我的朋友桑丘·潘沙是个大腹便便的男人，
可爱的女仆什么的……您想问我关于桑丘的事？

桑丘正可谓是我最好的朋友，我最好的仆从！
我那苦难深重而荣光闪耀的旅途，若是没有了他
一定会有所褪色的吧！

诶，再多说一点再多说一点？
我们的大冒险。还有一个小插曲———


嗯，嗯。
我也很开心。
和你的旅行、冒险，是如此无可替代的
美丽的事物。
profile.NA:
"Ah, my lovely Princess Dulcinea! Your Don Quixote de la Mancha returned from a great adventure to spread the word of your noble and lovely figure!


Huh, you want to hear about the pretty maid who traveled with me? I don't know what you mean. Sancho was no pretty maid, he was a potbellied man... You want to hear about Sancho?


Sancho is my greatest friend and greatest squire! The heights of my distress would have caused the glory of my travel to fade away without him!


Wow, you're so eager to hear more. Then here is an anecdote of our great adventure..."

...

"Yes. I also enjoyed it immensely, milord. Our travels, our adventures, were ones of irreplaceable beauty."

mcLink: 惹人怜爱的公主与忠实的骑士
fandomLink: The Lovely Princess and the Faithful Knight

profile.CN:
太平道信徒们佩戴的黄色头巾。

颜色的来历有很多种说法，
既有来源于五行之说，也有来源于对黄帝的信仰的说法……
不管怎么说，民众们都相信着，只有身着这种颜色并奋起斗争，才能与未来相系。

「嚯，嚯，嚯。确实，并不是每个绑着它的民众
  都能完全理解太平道的全部吧。
  但是，尽管如此……有一种团结为一体的感觉，可以这么说吧。
  回想起来。
  把黄巾绑在头上，成群结队的百姓。
  听着我的话语，双眼闪闪发光的人们。
  啊……那才是，
  也许那才是我们想要的。
  放眼望去，黄巾满地的景象，就像是……
  就像是果实累累的稻穗铺满了大地——」

那是连接他和人民的颜色。
即使闭上眼睛，眼前也会浮现出的他们活着的证明。
profile.NA:
The yellow headgear worn by the devouts of the Way of Great Peace.


There are multiple theories about the choice of color. Some say it was picked based on [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wuxing_(Chinese_philosophy) wuxing], others say it was out of reverence to the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yellow_Emperor Yellow Emperor]... All that's known for sure is that the people believed that wearing that color was what they needed to reach a better future.


"Heh heh heh. True, not everyone wearing this turban understood the Way of Great Peace. Even so... they were united. I think back to the crowds lined up with the same yellow turban on their heads, listening to my words with sparkles in their eyes. Ah... In hindsight, that was the sight we all dreamed of. Yellow turbans as far the eye can see, looking like a land of rice ready for harvest..."


The color connected him to his subjects. The image he sees when he closes his eyes is proof they were alive.

profile.CN:
得以撰述编订成文的不可外传的万世集。
为了架构起人物与虚幻，会悄然篡入一切书籍之间。
profile.NA:
The thousands of composed, spun, and compiled forbidden pages.

They are quietly mixed into various kinds of books to spread falsehoods to people.

profile.CN:
恣意绽放的齿轮的琼葩。
机械装置的圆舞，将会为了那无限之梦不断地延续下去。
profile.NA:
The blooming gear roars.

The mechanical circle continues to dance for endless dreams.

profile.CN:
眼前的乃是富士。
宛若一株在我心中摇曳，在风中起舞的柳树。
那份冲动，托付给了指尖来细细琢磨。

虽然有些遗憾，只能以素描的形式完成它，
但确实也缺少细致描绘的时间。

啊，这叫人爱惜的、美好的旅程啊。
应该为此躁动焦灼吗。
或是应该表露欢欣吗。

这可真是，足以为之疯狂的烦扰啊。
profile.NA:
In my eyes, Mt. Fuji is like a willow dancing in the wind, it sways my hearts.

I carefully express these urges through my fingertips.


While it's regretful that I would have to settle for a sketch, there is not enough time to fully finish drawing it.


Ahh, how lovely and beautiful this journey is.

So, should I be angry?

Or should I honestly be happy about it?


Dear me, it's so agonizing that it's driving me crazy.

profile.CN:
于凡夫不登之巅，
钢刀舞动闪闪发亮，玉矛柄挥舞虎虎生风。

可以说，眼中有甲便无乙。
打个比方就是，看到了好便无坏。
没有二者兼得的道理。

这就是万夫不当吧。

月亮也厌倦了向下看，打了个哈欠。
被永无止境的剑戟之音——悄悄吞噬了。
profile.NA:
On a pinnacle unreachable by mere ordinary men,

Brilliantly dancing rigid blade, fiercely swinging jade halberd.

One could say, when a first is seen then the second will be non-existed.

Or so to speak, superior outshines inferior.

Indecisive will be unreasonable.


That is, Being Unrivaled by Ten Thousand Men.

The moon has had enough for looking upon them, its yawn

has silently engulfed by the endless clashing of sword and halberd.

profile.CN:
自由。
这是自由。
没有尽头的宽广。
没有尽头的遥远。

奔跑吧。
追逐吧。

伴着风。
伴着青草香气追逐吧。
profile.NA:
Freedom.

Here is freedom.

Endlessly wide.

Endlessly faraway.


Let's run.

Let's sprint.


Together with the wind.

Chasing after the sweet scent of the grasses.

profile.CN:
秉持信念，注入子弹（心）。
无论你逃到哪里，
无论你躲到哪里，
都会瞄准目标百发百中，
击穿你的胸膛哦。

请你务必，有所觉悟。

「……巴亲，和公主不一样，你真的在瞄准心脏对吧？」
「是啊。我确实在瞄准啊？」
profile.NA:
Put all your feelings and determination into the bullet (heart).

No matter where you run or hide, my aim will stay true and I will shoot you right in the chest.


So please, be prepared for it.


"......Tomoe-Chan, unlike Hime, you really are aiming right at the heart, aren't you?"

"Yes. I am, of course?"

profile.CN:
读本『南总里见八犬传』。
九辑，全九十八卷、一百零六册。
创作发行用时长达二十八年。
耗费了通俗作家·曲亭马琴的半生心血的大作。
在当时的江户就已经被以歌舞伎和净琉璃的形式搬上舞台，
至今都对一系列作品有着影响。

从东家处出走的年轻的马琴曾写下：
「寒风凋木叶 兴会所至拂袖去 如神作远行」。
虽然是仿佛要以神无月（10月）时远赴出云集会的众神同自己作比
这样有些妄自尊大的诗句，但『八犬传』本身正是马琴的行路之体现。
profile.NA:
Reading-Book "Nansō Satomi Hakkenden".

Nine compilations, ninety-eight volumes, one hundred and six books in total.

A monumental work with a publication period spanning twenty-eight years,
 
taking up half the lifetime of the Gesaku novelist Kyokutei Bakin.

Since the times of the Edo period it has been performed through Kabuki and Jōruri,

and has influenced works from a wide range of genres up until the modern times.

The young Bakin composed the following haiku having left the place of his employment,

"In the cold wintry wind (Kigarashi ni) I have made up my mind (Omohitachikeri) To journey with the gods (Kami no Tabi)".

It is a rather haughty haiku, as if likening himself to be akin to the gods who congregate in Izumo during the Kannazuki​

however "Hakkenden" was the journey of Bakin itself.

profile.CN:
拉弓搭箭，随后射击。
铁镞会十分轻易地贯穿人的身体。
大体上，人的身体就像是表皮下装满了肉和水的袋子。
如果被既高速，又尖锐的东西刺中，极高概率会死亡。

那么，如吾这般。
由如吾这般的怪物。
来射人的话，会怎么样呢。
五人、十人的身体都会被贯穿撕裂，
连城门都能轻松破坏。

那么，船舰如何呢。
……结果如你所见。
吾之箭矢撕裂了船只，溺死了上面的人。

虽然这是理当为之昂扬振奋的一击，但也稍微有些心痛。
如果这箭矢赋予的死亡是光荣的死亡，
那么因船被毁坏而致的死亡也许就是凄惨的死亡吧。
身处战场之中，却不战而溺亡。

吾之箭，绝不是慈悲的一箭。
希望你能记住这一点，御主。
吾等将战斗和死亡视作荣誉，并毫不畏惧地直面它。
然而，在那其中……存在无法尽数的，
未免过于残酷的死亡。

战斗，决不是值得称道之事。
虽然身为战斗机械的我，即便如此言说
——也不免显出可笑就是了。
profile.NA:
Nock the arrow on the bow, then shoot it.

An iron arrowhead can easily pierce through a human's body.

Since the human's body is basically like a bag stuffed full of meat and water put inside a layer of skin, if a sharp object was to pierce it, death would be the most likely outcome.


Then, if a monster like me, if someone like me was to shoot humans, what would happen?

Five, even ten bodies would be hollowed out, and even the castle gates would be simply destroyed.


In that case, what about a ship?

The result is as you can see.

My arrow has ripped the ship to pieces and left its people drowning.


That single blow should have raised my spirits also pained me a little.

If death by arrow is called a glorious death, then death by the destruction of the ship probably would be considered a cruel death.

You remain within the midst of battle, yet not fighting, just struggling in the water.


My arrow was never an arrow of mercy.

I want you to remember this, Master.

We consider battles and death an honour, and we fight against it without fear.

Even so, behind it all....There are countless cruel death as such.


Fighting is not good at all.

A combat machine like me, saying such a thing―――I must have sounded like quite the laughing stock.

fandomLink: A Single Blow to Fell a Ship

fandomLink: Heroic Spirit Dream Portrait: Mochizuki Chiyome

profile.CN:
自巨眼的临终之刻零落而出的红泪的瓮棺。
在炖煮中凝集的叹息的沉淀，深刻而激烈地诅咒着生者。
profile.NA:
An urn of bloody tears spilt over from giant eyes when they die.

The sediment of boiled and hardened grief curses living beings with intensely and violently.

profile.CN:
铺设有神秘的灵剂之心房。
伪造的血浆，将会疏通为更上一层的基盘弥补缺陷的河流。
profile.NA:
The heart of spiritual medicine built up of sacred mysteries.

The plasma of falsehood passes through patched up rivers to the new foundation.

profile.CN:
淡然地宣读出了模拟战的结果。
真的是，亏得你能坚持到今天呢。

御主和魔术师可不是能划等号的关系。
就算都有适性，技术水平的差别也得另说。

不过，正因如此才有教导的价值。
虽然你这水平离A组那帮人还远得很呢———
profile.NA:
The simulation results are briefed as a matter-of-factly.

Honestly, it’s hard to believe he’s made it this far.


Being a Master does not make you a mage, and vice versa.

You may be blessed with aptitude, but skills are another matter you have to work on.


It’s precisely why teaching him would be worth the while.

That said, he has a long way to go before he can reach Team A’s level.

unknownCharacters: 希翁·艾尔特纳姆·索卡里斯

profile.CN:
好的作战始于好的会议。

如今的迦勒底，
一只手拿着美味的三明治或者咖啡，

有时只是为了度过这美妙的时光。

Sometimes they are struck with inspiration, and sometimes they just enjoy a good time together.

profile.NA:

profile.CN:
在许多的战场之上，看见了人性之恶。
看见了收割无辜之花的地狱。
而在那其中，看见了于所有的一切都因死而断绝的土地之上，
还存在为生存而挣扎着的———生命的强韧。

故而开始寻求救世主的碎片。
为众多的知性，赋予名为抗争的超越。

毕竟，这就是为了报偿那逝去的无数生命，
为了让渐入老境的世界再次抵达成熟期的，
唯一的阶梯。

老兵在等待。
那个自己的使命与矜持交互的时刻。

仅仅只是无所事事地看着那早已生锈的样子。
对着这半途而废的黑铁之枪，
再一次，心中静静为这倾注的荣耀自豪。

然后，追寻至这扭曲的道路的尽头，
祈愿这将是信念的尽头。

就这样，公主大人回到了星之内海之后。
那份回忆化作种子，变作了湖畔盛开的花。

他曾称其“很像”的，
与原生的物种不同的，仅此一朵的地上之花。

仿佛是在占卜着爱情，
又仿佛是在重温着回忆，
犹如梦见般地述说着。

『即便，我们已远远相离
 也希望如今的你
 不要将这月光遗忘。』

不断重叠，不断往复。
愿这波浪的声响，也能回响于那个人的世界之中。

    ◆

……哎，先不说那些，

『我是个疯丫头公主，还真是抱歉啊！ 』

你那些毫不留情的批评，
我可都一清二楚地记着呢！
profile.NA:
And so, upon the princess' return to the Inner Sea of the Planet, her memories turned to seed and bloomed as flowers on the lakeshore.


He had told her that she "resembled" it, not a primordial seed, but a single surface flower.


As if contemplating his love, repeating a memory in her head, or simply dreaming, the words left her mouth.


"So that no matter the distance between us, you will never forget the moonlight."


Refrain, refrain. May the roar of the waves be heard in his world too.


◆


Leaving that aside though...

"Well I'm sorry for being a tomboy princess!"

I still firmly remember your merciless criticisms too, you know!

profile.NA:
The sword wielded by the Red Knight.

―――

It was shattered in the middle of the battle, and now the crimson Demonic Sword rests beneath the earth.

The one who broke the sword was none other than me.

I brilliantly snapped the Red Knight's sword by wielding my spear that the Great Mage Merlin had reinforced himself.


The same Great Mage has once said:

The Red Knight is the embodiment of the Demon of Calamity itself.

Then have you… Rid Britain from all its disasters for once?

From all the calamities?


― I couldn’t reply.

My silence was the omen for the endless calamities that would still threaten Britain.

All that my young-self did was remain idle, just peering over the sword that lay there broken.

unknownCharacters: 爱丽丝菲尔·冯·爱因兹贝伦

profile.CN:
在夜晚迎来破晓的前一刻。
那家伙喜欢还能在天穹中见到星辰的分界之刻。
单纯闲得无聊的我，虽然并不是特别好奇，
却还是问了他最喜欢的星星是哪一颗。

「是天狼星（Sirius）啦。」

那是在观测之时所能见到的最为强烈的光芒。
从大地仰望天穹——
那就像是在由地球向着远方进发的航海中亮起的灯塔一样吧，
那家伙像个小孩子似的得意地微笑。

……没有这样的吧。
因为实在是太过讽刺，
我甚至没能做到像往常那样出言挖苦些什么。

「我说。要是真成了什么『最后的人类』，
　你会去干些什么呢？」

是啊。
露出了清冷中又带有些许寂寞的眼神，
那家伙回答道。

「不去专门设定什么目标，就随心所欲地出去旅行，
　这么说的话如何呢？」

直到如今，我依然在回想着那个未来（愿望）。

「在一切的一切都焕然一新以后，去越过那片海洋。」

仿佛耀眼的晨光。
profile.NA:
Just before the night is over.

He loved that moment when the stars are still visible in the sky.

With too much free time on my hand, I asked what his favourite star was even though I had no interest in his answer.


"It's Sirius."


The brightest visible light as you observe them.

When you look at the sky from the ground―――it looks like a lighthouse during a journey sailing faraway from Earth, doesn’t it? He said and smiled proudly like a child.


......Don't act like that.

It was such an ironic talk that I couldn't mock him like usual.


"Hey, you. What's your plan when you become "the last human"?"


Let's see... He said, looking cool, yet a bit lonely.


"What if I say I'd like to go on a carefree journey with no particular destination in mind?"


Even now, I still think about that future (wish).


"Go beyond that sea, where everything became brand new."


It was so dazzling, just like the morning light.

profile.CN:
阻滞勇敢的魂灵踏上旅程的虚无的闭锁。
无论如何拘束，又如何禁止，却终究束缚不了心灵的自由。
profile.NA:
A foolish barrier of chains preventing the departure of brave souls.

profile.CN:
于暗夜中鳞次栉比耸立着的恸哭的乱桩。

profile.NA:
A palisade of lamentation lining up in the dark night.

The dead are sewn onto the dark canals to prevent their eternal partings from being tainted.

profile.CN:
波涛般升起的热情在涡流中旋转，闪烁。

我怎么可能忘记。
我怎么也不可能忘记的。
就这样背负着如此沉重，
无法放手的记忆。

是接受这无法切断的因缘呢，
还是被其囚禁，沉入黑暗呢。

手中残存的刀，刀尖仍在激荡，
要守护之人已不在———又为谁去挥动呢。
profile.NA:
The violent emotion rises up like the surging sea, swirling around and brewing.


I will never forget it.

There is no way I would ever forget about it.

Unable to let go of these feelings, she bears them on her back as they continue to smoulder.


Would she swallow that unbreakable bond, or let herself be captured and sink into the darkness?


The blade bequeathed upon her hands, its tip hung in the air with no one left to protect―――Who would it be wielded for?

profile.CN:

不过。
无妄之灾
和咎由自取，

profile.NA:

By the way, remember that "some unreasonable stuffs you did not remember doing" and "paying for your own mistake" are as different as night and day.

Kneading and turning, turning and kneading.


Whittle down the soil with your own hands and give it a new form.

对那些走过自山顶蜿蜒而下的坡道，前路漫漫的行者。

Then, they send you off with some delicious tea.

跨越悠久的时代，一骑绝尘茶道大战，如今拉开帷幕！

利休「点茶要合口，放炭烧水要恰到好处，要让客人

传说中的邪马台国初代女王的后继者，二代女王壹与，终于自久远的彼端前来此地！

壹与「所以说，就麻烦你向大家

profile.CN:
如水一般。

如同绵长的流水一般，纤柔轻快、
自由阔达地，将焦灼此身的愤怒放流。

似花一般。

好似盛开于原野的花朵一般，无声而艳丽、茁壮而明朗地，将那份思念送往遥远故乡的天空。

与女儿分离的亲辈，与双亲分离的女儿。两个无处可去的思念便在那片土地上相遇了。

一边为之愤怒，一面为之悲伤，而后便是彼此的哀怜、灵魂的交叠。仿佛是互相帮携着对方，又仿佛是彼此抚慰着对方，两个灵魂就这样，浑然一体、宛若天成地，将姿态整合为一。

「如是这般，利休便是驹姬，驹姬也便是利休」

就请将这柄茶杓视作利休的思绪，将这枣形茶罐视作驹姬的心意，我们将献给就这样原原本本地接纳了我们的您的情感，此刻倾注在这一席之间。

——亦如水，亦似花。
profile.NA:
Like water.


Let the anger, which was burned into your body, flow away freely, openly, gracefully, and easily, just like flowing water.


Like flowers.


Open your feelings to the sky of your distant homeland quietly, brightly, vigorously, and cheerfully, just like the flowers blooming in the field.


The parents who were separated from their daughter and the daughter who was separated from her parents. The two feelings with no where to go meet each other at that place.


One person was angry at their circumstance, the other was sad, and then, as they both pity the other, their souls overlap.


To help one another other, to sooth one another other, the two souls, as they are, become one in harmony and order.


"In this way, Komahime is Rikyuu, and Rikyuu is Komahime."


Think of this bamboo tea scoop as Rikyuu and this tea caddy as Komahime, now, we have put our feelings for you, who accept us as we are, into this ceremony.


―――Like water, like flowers.

profile.CN:
近藤，我已经做好觉悟了。

土方君，我的生命，请为新选组而使用吧。

斋藤君，希望你能帮助土方君。

永仓君，你那毫无顾虑的说话方式对队伍是不可或缺的。

原田君，你那让人恨不起来的性格一定能救赎大家的。

伊东先生，请把您的见识和智慧借给大家吧。

藤堂君，这是我的责任，请不要怨恨局长。

源三郎，有你这样的人在是很重要的。

冲田君，给你添麻烦了呢。

各位，请面向前方吧。虽然我已经回身向后方而去，但我希望大家能继续向前方迈进。

——集结于诚之旗下的同伴们。

我如今，就在此处。虽然还不清楚这究竟是惩罚，抑或是罪孽，但即便如此我也要向着前方迈进。

就像我那天对大家的期许一样，前行吧。
profile.NA:

Hijikata-kun, use my life for the sake of the Shinsengumi.

Saitou-kun, lend Hijikata-kun your aid.

Nagakura-kun, the corps needs that unabashed bluntness of yours.

Harada-kun, your friendliness will definitely help everyone out someday.

Itou-sensei, please lend everyone your insight and wisdom.

Toudou-kun, this is my own responsibility. Please, don't hold a grudge against the commander.

Genzaburou-san, people like you must be treasured.

Okita-kun, I've been a burden to you.

Everyone, please face forward. I've turned back, but I want you all to keep on walking forward.

———My friends who have gathered under the banner of "sincerity."

Right now, I am here. Whether that is a punishment or a sin, I don't know. Even so, I'll keep walking forward.

Just as we all wished on that day, let us keep walking.

profile.CN:
婴孩降生了。
那婴孩不可思议地没有发出任何声音，只是紧握着手。
婴孩的手中有一枚漆黑的、泛着光的勾玉。

婴孩降生后不久，孩子的双亲就死去了。
因为流行病而死去了。
婴孩于是被一族之人视作共同的亲人收养了。
婴孩的手中有一枚漆黑的、泛着光的勾玉。

婴孩长成幼童时，亲人也死去了。
因战争而死去了。整族人都疏远了幼童。
移居出集落，疏远了幼童。
幼童的手中有一枚漆黑的、泛着光的勾玉。

幼童长成少女时，一整族的人都死去了。
因为疾病、风暴、战争、饥荒而死去了。
因为为人所恐惧的灾祸，
因为这样那样的灾祸，大家都死去了。
少女的手中有一枚漆黑的、泛着光的勾玉。

如果你没有降生到这世上就好了，她在诅咒的声音中成长，如果你没有降生到这世上就好了，少女这样诅咒着自己。在诅咒与被诅咒中，她继续生存着。在不情愿中成为了众人期待的巫女。
巫女的手中有一枚漆黑的、泛着光的勾玉。

——一切都是源自这漆黑勾玉的、毁灭之巫女的力量。

但那一定是我的误解。我降生于世并没有罪。因为曾有人这样告诉过我。因为曾有人这样相信着。

「所以，未来啊，我想要你和我一起证明。
　证明这份力量也可以拯救别人，甚至干脆可以
　拯救世界！」

——漆黑的勾玉，一定不会再泛起光芒了吧。
profile.NA:
A baby was born.

Strangely enough, that baby did not make any sound, and was clutching something in her hand.

A single black magatama shine within her hand.


As soon as she was born, both of her parents passed away.

They died from an epidemic.

The baby was adopted by a relative.

A single black magatama shine within her hand.


When the baby grew into a child, her relative also passed away.

They died in battle.

The other relatives kept their distance from her.

She was sent to live in the outskirt of the village.

A single black magatama shine within her hand.


When the child grew into a young girl, her relatives also passed away.

They died of diseases, storms, wars, hungers, fearsome calamities, and every conceivable misfortunes.

A single black magatama shine within her hand.


It would have been better if she was never born, as she was nurtured by the voice of the curses, the young girl continued to curse herself, wishing that she had never been born. She lived on, cursing others and being cursed.

Unwanted, yet also wanted, the young girl became a shrine maiden.

A single black magatama shine within the shrine maiden's hand.


―――It's all because of the power of the black magatama, the power of the shrine maiden of destruction.


But now I know that is not true at all. Being born is not a sin. There was someone who taught me that. There was someone who believed so.


"That's why, Mirai-san, I want you to prove it with me. Prove that my power can save the people, and even the world!!"


―――The black magatama will never shine again.

profile.CN:
蕴有许多世界的可能性的大树的种核。

profile.NA:
The shelled fruits of a huge tree housing many worlds and possibilities.

profile.CN:

profile.NA:

profile.CN:

Softly swaying.

Nothing in particular.

profile.CN:

profile.NA:

profile.CN:
汗水是让笑容开花结果的，最棒的养料。

如果这些，

profile.NA:
The sweat on your brow is the best boon in making people smile.


Especially if this is to be eaten by someone.


The weight of your accomplishment, the pain of your skin being burned by the sunlight, and even the smell of the soil clinging to your skin, everything will turn into a gratuitous joy, completely different from one you get from the battlefield.

profile.CN:
大朵怒放，正值芳龄的你啊。

如同自由舞动的棍子，

profile.NA:
Bloom magnificently, of you whom at beautiful age.

No matter what we are capable of,

profile.CN:
侍奉也好，征服也好，

profile.NA:
To serve, or to conquer,

Days after days of skill honing

Is what will bring forth true glory.

 
Be aware.

 
To prevent infection by sugar-coated rotten seeds,

Please don’t forget to always keep an eye opened.

profile.CN:
以笑作肴，以泪为酌，
洗尽不安，便斟满欢愉。

杯盅之渴即吾心之渴。

那便是宴会。

今日、明日、后日乃至再下一日，
呜呼，来吧，还请再来一杯。
profile.NA:
With laughter as the side dish, admire the tears.

Wash away the dangers and be filled with great joy.

That is the banquet.

profile.CN:
华丽地、无比华丽地。
赐予所有牺牲者安宁，赋予所有生还者奋进。

平常都吊儿郎当的侠客们，此刻也都以严肃的态度，

善人卷入其中。

亦守望之」，也如此坚信着奔走起来。

飞舞散落的花瓣灿若云霞。

profile.NA:
Magnificent, so magnificent.

Placing peace upon all the deceased, and motivations to all the survivors.

 
The heroes who usually acted like ruffians are all sternly staring at the taoist priest.

They stood out for righteousness, slayed the evildoers, getting good people involved.

Even so, they firmly believe that “their path is of justice, being watched over by all the stars of the heaven” as they marched forward.

 
Scattering blossoms danced like the twilight.

Mourning words spoken like a melody.

Only the proud ambitions resides in their hearts.

 
--- Everything has vanished, like a dreamy moment.

profile.CN:
据说是得自北海的，
极不寻常的莺。
虽然详细信息不明，却拥有能够伤到显出本体的妲己的面容甚至追撵她的力量。
平时虽然是关在赤红色的鸟笼中，但在化作以从者之姿现界的黄飞虎的一部分的现如今，停在他健硕的肩上享受自由的时候也变多了。

与塞弥拉弥斯或是泳装迦摩一同出任务的时候，也常能看到它和鸽子或是鹦鹉们用鸟语交流的景象。

另外，有试着以玩笑态度和对动物会话比较有心得的人问了它们在聊些什么，却被以一句「还是不知道为好」回复并移开了视线。
profile.NA:
An extraordinary warbler obtained in the northern seas.

It's powerful enough to drive away Daji's true form and scar her face, although it's unknown how or why.
He normally had it in a red cage, but now that the bird is a part of Servant Huang Feihu, it is often enjoying its freedom on Feihu's burly shoulders.


Whenever I send him on a party with Semiramis or Swimsuit Kama, the warbler can be seen talking in birdese with their doves and parrot.


One day I got interested and asked the people who understand animal conversation what they talk so much about, but all of them averted their gaze and answered "You're better off not knowing".

profile.CN:
史进君，是史进君！
很厉害的哦！

扯——那么一下，就会变得很长了哦！
咕噜咕噜就飞上天了哦！
甚至可以噗噗噗地喷出火焰哦！
甚至还可以当竹马踩高跷玩哦！

史进君，是能说话的！
虽然不能长时间说话，

所以说，我啊。最喜欢史进君了！
以后我们也要一直在一起哦！

———当然了，我的朋友。我的伙伴。
就算摇篮之梦结束，一切回归正轨之时，

profile.NA:
Hey, hey, you know what!?

Shi Jin-Kun is really awesome!


Just a wiggle, and he grows really long!

Just a roll, and he can fly up to the sky!

Just a woosh, and he can spew flame!

profile.CN:
击中那个男人的凶弹，有说是四发，有说是五发。

男人吞下了掺了毒的食物，却没有倒下，
仿佛是要让身体的要害承接子弹般站起了身，
遗体最后被抛进了冰冷的冬河。

男人所成之事，其善恶的所在
并非生活在今天的我等所能衡量。
而可以确定的事情，只有男人是皇帝的友人，以及他否定战争，
向祖国的人民传递神之爱，这样的记录而已。

许多的阴谋，许多的恫吓。
欺诈。交涉。毒杀。暗杀。
尽管有着很多困难，男人却始终没有
淡然接受这一切，而是抗争到了最后。

就算肉体会倒下，信仰却不会倒下。
即使理想会泯灭，信仰也不会泯灭。
绝不会消逝，绝不会被打倒。
不论是怎样的武器也好人类也罢，
都不会动摇男人的存在方式分毫。

　◆

男人自神的教诲匮乏、贫瘠的农田中来。
为不毛之地带来了抽芽的新种。
那萌发其本身，仿佛就该是主的奇迹。
profile.NA:
It was said that this man was shot four or five times.

He did not collapsed even after eating a poisoned meal, he stood up after taking bullets to the vital parts of his body, and his dead body was thrown into the freezing winter river.


People who live in the present time like us cannot measure whether what he had accomplished was right or wrong, good or evil.

All we know for sure is the records of that man being a friend of the Emperor, that he protested wars, and that he preached the love of God to the people of his fatherland.


There were many schemes, many threats.

Swindles. Negotiations. Poisonings. Assassinations.

There were so many hardships, but the man did not take them lying down, he fought against them until the very end.


His body might have collapsed, but his faith did not.

His ideals might have been lost, but his faith did not.

It will never disappear, nor will it be broken.

No kind of weapons or human beings could change the way he lived.

　◆


The man has arrived, coming from a poor farmland where the Lord's teaching is scarce.

A seed has sprouted in the barren land, as if to say what happened was surely a miracle of the Lord.

profile.CN:
古埃及的神兽。
尼托克丽丝会在战斗时召唤、使役它。
与其说是生物，不如说更接近法则或是现象，居所在冥界。有着鳄鱼一般的头部。
据说如果变化为最大尺寸的话，会是远超斯芬克斯的体格。

「契约者，契约者。
　还请转告法老·奥斯曼狄斯。
　我的阿米特，和他的光辉之大复合神殿的
　基座部分所收纳的超大型个体是两种东西。
　真是的，老是被误会，着实不快至极。

　嗯？
　你是说……让我直接和他说不就好了？

　听好了契约者。
　我就是，那个，稍微有点抽不开身。
　虽然只是稍微，但抽不开身的事情就是抽不开身。
　可没有工夫在这些琐事上纠缠。
　综上所述，就请你来转告他了。
　拜托你了。
　我可是拜托你了哦？」

被封存在自天花板降下的牢笼中的幽冥灯火。
那一方又一方的摇篮，是为了契合魂灵之形而设。

昏暗之夜的夹缝之间。
被植在树木的空洞中的小虫，
安然无恙地渡过了严冬，正要于此展翅。

在那前方等待着的，并非洗濯污秽的清水。
只不过是，自森林之外吹拂进来的，
柔和而又温暖的——春天的风。

拒绝斟满杯盏，
即是对杯盏存在这一事实的否认。
这只能说是对创造了万事万物的尊贵的神的反叛。

因为渴了。
那么就应该止渴。

只要我，还存在着。

魔术师界瑰丽的蓝宝石。
同时，也是地上最为优美的猎手。

自那婀娜宛转的指尖释放而出的，
是力道强劲，而又直率专一的，
高昂地回响着的，清廉的曲调。

profile.CN:
所谓教诲不过是他人记述的经验。
不论是怎样正确的道路，视立场不同所观照的侧面也会相异。
会诞生矛盾便是非常理所当然的事情。

也就是说。

此时此地应当宣讲的并非谁人的教诲。
值得广加传布的，惟有遍照万物的吾神而已。

神啊，您是至高！

我的朋友只有特佩乌哥哥，
还有一直守护着我的太阳（你）而已。
但我却度过了，
比其他任何人类都更加波澜壮阔、满载着爱意的人生。

花去六千六百万年的时光，
与你们向往着同样的彼方（天宇），
终于成为了人类。

——这是一幅往昔之日的绘画。
在万物平等的，无论是谁都同等高贵的树海之中，
诞生了小小的特别之例的，过去那繁星垂降的夜晚的景象。
而后你在脑海中描绘。
忘却了自己该与何人等同，也忘却了何人都应与自己等同的，即便不断重演着许多的过错，也依然纵身投入自由的旅途的，他们的冒险谭。

profile.CN:
Ocēlōmeh。豹之战士。
如其名所述，是令豹灵寄宿于身并凭此战斗的，
强壮的战士。
这个面具便是证明。
不论是怎样的时代、怎样的肉体，
其内的灵兽（Tonal）都能与你成为一体。

「哎呀，其实中南美还有一种驯服鹫鸟战斗的叫
　Cuāuhtin的战士呢。但实际上这个才是战士
　的代名词，那个总而言之就忘了吧」

厌恶武器是好事。但不可遗忘武器。
吾乃战神，乃王权的象征。
维持传统，虽喜怒无常却必然言而有信。
就算你是个弱小的战士，我也不会说你不像样。去摸索弱小者的突破口吧。
我会尊重具备时刻准备战斗的意识的人。
如同在密林的幽暗间研磨利齿的野兽一般。
这个面具，应该能让你的血沸腾起来吧。

　　◆

「……虽然话是这么说，不过还有一点要注意。
　我虽然是豹之战士们的神明，但可不是豹神。
　和魁札尔科亚特尔一样，是蛇神哦。
　有羽之蛇司掌了丰收与农耕，
　而雷鸣之蛇司掌着战争与胜利。
　只不过中南美最为强大的圣兽是豹，
　所以最受尊崇的神明也就和豹联系在一起了，就是这么回事」

不管是怎样优越的地势，
不管是如何繁华的城建，
不管是多么丰饶的自然环境，
移居到陌生的土地上，总归是有一些抵触情绪——
是啊。人类是会对建筑和土地抱有爱执的生物。
我能理解，你无法下定决心搬家时的心情。
但是，为了更好的生活，也必须要做出决断。
为此，我准备了安全·万无一失的计划。

『保持着现在的生活步调走向新天地！
　保证您即使在异国他乡也有不变的生活质量！
　在详细说明之前，还请完成契约！』

以上，都是身为能干的都市神理所当然的馈赠。
就不要表现得太激动了。没在激动，反而是被惊到了？
什么嘛。不都一样吗。
啊对了，本次服务要被当做展示用事例的，所以我也会和你同居。
因为是新建房，应该不会有什么问题……的吧？

那么就是这样。因为只想让你回想起轻松快乐的事情，
所以比起武器还是选了更为日常的东西。
就算消逝之日终会到来，这点东西应该还是可以留下来的。
是我中意的夹克衫，和我收下的最初的赠礼。

　　◆

我戴着会不会也合适呢，什么的，
想要打扮得更华丽一点，什么的，
并不是出于那种利己的想法。

『明亮、轻快、柔和的颜色。
　为了效仿与之相配的神明，
　我才塑成了我的心与躯体』

话虽如此，对于身为神明者而言，对人类社会的
娱乐产品的渴望是鄙贱的。
我以为那样的行为本身就是神明失格的体现，所以忍啊忍，忍啊忍，忍到最后实在忍不住了去买的时候，却买不到了。
就在我无比失落的时候，

「如果不嫌弃的话就收下吧，因为我认识一位应该会很适合这个的，
　和你很像的人」

这个发饰自不必说，最让我高兴的是那句话。
因为那『应该会很适合的人』是怎样的人，
我已经从那满载着亲切之意的双瞳中读到了。
既缺乏自信又没有自觉的自称·神明大人，就在那一刻，得到了许下的愿望、刚好的时机，以及把神明做下去的价值！

——而关于那之后的纪行，就等以后有机会再说吧。
虽然，就算为了回报所获得的信赖而做出了努力，也是转瞬间便宣告了终结。
但我直到最后，都像太阳一样灿烂地笑着，对吧？
